name: La Charm Hoi An Hotel & Spa
address: 64 Đào Duy Từ, Cẩm Phô, Hội An, Việt Nam
description:
Nằm ở Hội An, cách Chùa Cầu 8 phút đi bộ, La Charm Hoi An Hotel & Spa cung cấp chỗ nghỉ có xe đạp miễn phí, chỗ đậu xe riêng miễn phí, hồ bơi ngoài trời và trung tâm thể dục. Khách sạn 4 sao này cung cấp dịch vụ phòng, quầy lễ tân 24 giờ và Wi-Fi miễn phí. Khách sạn có sân hiên và nhìn ra thành phố, ngoài ra du khách có thể thưởng thức bữa ăn tại nhà hàng hoặc đồ uống tại quầy bar.

Khách sạn sẽ cung cấp cho khách các phòng được trang bị điều hòa có bàn làm việc, ấm đun nước, tủ lạnh, minibar, két an toàn, TV màn hình phẳng và phòng tắm riêng với vòi sen. Tại La Charm Hoi An Hotel & Spa, tất cả các phòng có ga trải giường và khăn tắm.

Chỗ nghỉ có phục vụ bữa sáng thực đơn buffet, kiểu lục địa hoặc kiểu Mỹ mỗi sáng.

Đi xe đạp là hoạt động được ưa chuộng trong khu vực. Ngoài ra, chỗ nghỉ có dịch vụ thuê ô tô.

La Charm Hoi An Hotel & Spa cách Bảo tàng lịch sử Hội An 14 phút đi bộ và Hội Quán Chi Hội Triều Châu Trung Quốc 1.5 km. Sân bay gần nhất là Sân bay Quốc tế Đà Nẵng, cách khách sạn 29 km, đồng thời chỗ nghỉ có cung cấp dịch vụ đưa đón sân bay mất phí.

review.comment_positive: Customer service were their key to our great stay, front desk, food and services staff.  Shout out to Ms. Thao from front desk and young Mr. Hien of food and service.  My husband had a mild cough and he fixed him a pot of hot honey lemon tea.  Such nice people they have working there and always show appreciation that you visit their hotels.  Highly recommended.

review.comment_positive: Lovely place to stay - charming, as the name suggests.  Good location.  Close to river action, but not so close as to be disturbed by noise.  Loved swimming in the pool.  Very helpful staff.  Very good breakfast.

review.rating: Charm is the perfect word to describe this hotel
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive:
I’ve previously visited Hoi An and have stayed in a few hotels and honestly, La Charm is the stand out for me. It ticks all of the boxes in terms of amenities, service and rooms.

But it’s the small details that really make this a cut above the rest. From the super attentive and friendly staff who got to know us and would check in to see how we were doing; the bright and bubbly housekeeping crew who’d greet us each day, to having everything we needed in our room so we never had to ask for anything else. Breakfast buffet had a great selection of items, the pool area was a great place to chill, the vibes overall exuded brightness, warmth and happiness.

Location-wise, it’s in a fairly quiet area, just outside of the hustle and bustle of the old town but walkable distance to everything. And if you’re ever feeling lazy or unable to walk, you could easily book a cheap ride with Grab.

Loved our stay here!
review.comment_negative: The only thing (although completely out of the control of the hotel) was a neighbouring rooster who’d crow each morning. I’d assume this would have only affected rooms located on the side of the hotel we were staying in. Just bring earplugs and you’ll be fine. Everything else about the hotel is amazing!

review.rating: Beautiful hotel in a great area, will definitely stay here again

Sehr guter Spa Bereich mit ruhiger Atmosphäre in Nebengebäude erreichbar über einen Innenhof.
Sehr sauberes Zimmer mit Balkon.

review.comment_positive:
El personal muy amable y atento, siempre con una sonrisa y dispuesto a ayudarte, nos dejaron hacer el check in antes de la hora.
A la llegada, te reciben con una bebida y una de las recepcionista te explica todo de la ciudad y oferta turística, a nosotros nos tocó Tao y quedamos muy contentos con ella.
El hotel es nuevo, nos contaron que se había abierto hace 2 meses y todo es nuevo, en buen estado, y el desayuno de los mejores durante mi estancia en hoteles en Vietnam, muy variado y abundante.

Relación calidad-precio estupenda.

review.comment_positive: The Property is beautiful and clean. The staff was just amazing, very friendly and welcoming. We felt absolutely comfortable there. The design is nice and everything was really clean. The breakfast was great, although not the best we had in hotels. They give you free bikes to cycle around the city and help you with information and booking on all activities possible. The staff was really the nicest people we met in hotels. They even gave us delicious cookies as a parting gift.
review.comment_negative: There is nothing to dislike. When we’re in Hoi An again, we will definitely be booking this hotel again. The only thing that could’ve been better for me would be small towels and water in the gym. Also for us personally we would have wished for the breakfast to have more of vietnamese cuisine. The buffet was good but very western.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: Very nice and clean , the rom has everything that I need . I love their breakfast, lots of options and the food is delicious. Definitely will be back here again soon … one more thing . Just a minute away from night market 😊 , very good location

review.rating: Exceptional service; excellent location; extremely clean. You won’t regret staying here!
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive:
This property really is a ‘charming’ hotel. It full of colour and beautifully decorated, extremely clean and the staff in particular are noteworthy as they pay keen attention to you from the moment you enter. Ms Thao as soon as I arrived helped figure out my plans for Hoi An based on our preferred activities and quickly arranged everything. For me this was extremely helpful as I was only in Hoi An for a very few days and wanted to make the most of my time. The staff will check in with you daily on the room condition, any issues that need to be addressed. They were not at all overbearing might I add- it’s just a really helpful way they have to make sure guests are ok. You also get treats when you check out ☺️. 

The breakfast is the best spread for a hotel of this range in Vietnam that I have had and for this price. The rooms and bathrooms are spacious and my room was exactly as indicated in the pictures on the site and booking.com. 

Had an excellent pedicure at the spa. They have a well equipped gym and a lovely pool and quiet space which again is a huge plus point! There are also bicycles to use available for free. Additionally to note the location of the hotel is in a quieter part of the town away from the immediate hustle and bustle, but all the action can be accessed with a safe and easy 3-5 minute walk.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive:
This hotel has a lot of charm & character while being delightfully 5☆ quality.
The staff were so attentive to our every need. We found the pillows a little high for our preference, but when I mentioned it, they were replaced in 10 mins.
Breakfast has so many choices and all delicious. 
The room & bathroom are spacious & stylish and the beds very comfortable. 
The staff gave us many recommendations for food & tailor & jewellery and they were also very good recommendations... (especially the Bahn My)

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive:
My family and I had a great time here, upon arrival at the hotel, Thao served us a welcome drink, shared with us their hotel facilities, showed us a map of attractions around Hoi An, and then sent us to our room.  They provide an extra-mile service. 
Our room was huge, the hotel staff was efficient whenever you needed any assistance, and they provided a quick laundry service with great ironing, as well as free bikes for riding around Hoi An. 
I highly recommend this hotel👍

review.rating: A fantastic hotel for a very reasonable price.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: Every staff member was warm and welcoming and remembered us. They were full of suggestions of things to see and do (Don’t miss Memories of Hoi An - it’s amazing!) The hotel itself is beautiful inside and out and our rooms were comfortable in every way with all the amenities. The buffet breakfast was superb. The pool was really lovely and we always found somewhere to sit and read after a dip. I used the spa for a massage and a gel pedicure and I am admiring my perfect toes right now! The spa had the usual serene music, aromatherapy scents and ginger tea and biscuits. We could walk into the old town along the river in a reasonable time. This is a very pretty hotel in the prettiest town in Vietnam.
review.comment_negative: Leaving. I wish we could have stayed a few more nights.

I had a little fever during one of my massage, she looked after me and she was very caring. I kept on going back. I did 3 spa days out of my 4 nights at La Charm.  The staff was so professional, and the massage was on point. I feel rejuvenated and so relaxed. 
Mrs Nga at reception looked after us well. Thank you for your service.

review.rating: great place recommended with earplugs only
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: Overall we had a great experience in La Charm: the staff was super helpful and polite, the property clean and comfortable, the breakfast had the biggest variety we experienced in Vietnam, and the pool are was definitely our savior during the afternoon heat. The location is also great, less than 10 minutes walk from the old town, so a really pleasant walk after dinner.
review.comment_negative: Unfortunately, the soundproofing is pretty much nonexistent in the building. We really planned Hoi An to be the peaceful harbor during our Vietnam trip where we just unwind and sleep in for a few days but we had no chance with all the noise around us starting from 6am. Of course, I don't blame the property for a a really loud construction next door, but the soundproofing should definitely be improved: roosters sounded as they were crowing in our room and we heard every word of the cleaning staff talking to there walkie talkies, so for a light sleeper like myself this left its stamp on the whole experience.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 3 Người/Gia Đình
review.comment_positive: Staff at La Charm is exceptionally helpful. Loved the customer service here. Breakfast buffet was excellent. Loved the hotel facilities. It is located very close to Hoi An ancient town and we walked around. Cycles were available if needed. Staff helped arrange taxis and tickets to the attractions we needed very promptly and also were proactive in letting us know the various options we had during our stay. They also have a good spa. Loved this experience.

review.rating: Skønt hotel vi gerne vil besøge igen
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: Super hotel hvor man går virkelig meget for pengene. Personalet var venlige, smilende og hjælpsomme. Sengen var ekstra stor og behagelig og området omkring poolen var hyggeligt.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 3 Người/Gia Đình
review.comment_positive: The service is super nice
review.comment_negative: More options at the buffet needed

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive:
This hotel has it all.
Great location, room, food, but what sets it apart from the rest is its EXCEPTIONAL staff.
From the chaps on the door to the team in the restaurant to the ladies on reception, every single one of them goes out of their way to make sure you're happy. A special mention to Ms Nga on reception, who took care of us via constant communication before our visit, to sorting out everything for us on arrival.
And the brilliant Huong (and her friend) in the restaurant who brightened our morning every day with their beautiful smiles and cheerful nature.
Staying in Hoi An, then this hotel is a shining beacon in a place of a thousand lanterns.

review.rating: Excellent service and massage, comfortable beds, and good breakfast
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: Service at this hotel is excellent.  Beds are the most comfortable out of all the hotels we stayed in vietnam.  Massage is also the best we had in vietnam and we went to a spa or massage place every 2-3 days.

review.room_type: Suite Thông Nhau Qua Cửa Nối
review.comment_positive: It is a beautiful property. The staffs were super helpful and very professional. I will always like to go property like this

review.rating: Will definitely recommend for your stay in Hoi an

Bravo a tous

review.comment_positive: Very good price/quality ratio. Staff (Ms. Thao) very kind and helpful during check-in and check-out and also forthcoming with regard to all our needs.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Thời Thượng Có Ban Công & Tầm Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi

review.comment_positive: Great location, free bicycle hire, helpful staff (Mrs Hong), spacious rooms and comfy beds
review.comment_negative: Pool was a bit warm and air conditioner leaked

review.comment_positive: The staff and service in this hotel makes you feel like staying in a very high end hotel. Compared to the price for the room this is excellent!

review.rating: Good hotel close to busy centre
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive:
The stuff was super nice, like in most places in Vietnam. Very attentive and understanding of the customers needs.
The hotel is nuts outside the very busy city centre, 15 mins walking distance, which it make it perfect as you wouldn’t want to stay right in the centre.
review.comment_negative: The breakfast wasn’t as good as expected and the noise in the street is too high (whether car passing or rooster singing in the morning you can hear it all)

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: Colazione al top varia e buona molta scelta ! Camera grande confortevole !

review.rating: We had a great stay of 8 nights and the hospitality was first class.

review.comment_positive: The property was conveniently located and well appointed.

review.rating: A very good choice to stay at La Charm

review.comment_positive: Everything. Facilities, pool, massage, location, value for money and amazing staff.

review.comment_positive: Staff is very friendly. The beds are comfortable it was a beautiful hotel

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: Buena ubicación, personal muy atento, desayuno muy completo, piscina y gimnasios muy bien. Relación calidad precio muy buena

review.rating: Höchst empfehlenswertes Hotel, sehr gutes Preis-Leistungs-Verhältnis.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: Sehr komfortabel, sehr gutes Frühstück, netter kleiner Pool und Garten, ruhige und doch zentrale Lage - und das Beste: absolut freundliches, hilfreiches und wirklich professionelles Personal, die sehr kompetent und zuverlässig beraten und weiterhelfen!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive:
The hotel was lovely and we really enjoyed the breakfast. All of the staff were very helpful and pleasant particularly when we required help to transport our luggage from Hoi An to Ho Chi Min via bus as we were going on a short trip and did not want to take large suitcases with us. 

We both really enjoyed the free bicycles provided by the hotel to travel around Hoi An.

The hotel provided with recommendations for getting clothes made which he used and were very happy with our purchases as they were great quality.

We felt well rested after our stay in the hotel and made use of the gym facilities.

review.room_type: Phòng Premium Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Ban Công & Tầm Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive: The staff was really nice and helpful. Helped us with guidance and tips for our stay. The location is really good, very close to Old Town and not in a noisy area. We were welcomed with delicious tea. The breakfast was also very good and diverse.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: L'hôtel a rouvert il y a deux mois. Tous les équipements sont donc neufs. Décoration cosy. Buffet de petit déjeuner superbe. Personnel nombreux et aux petits soins. Chambre vaste et lit confortanlr
review.comment_negative: Rien à reprocher. L'hôtel veut visiblement monter en gamme et réputation et fait donc tout pour cela. S'ils maintiennent leurs efforts nul doute qu'ils y parviendront

review.rating: Our stay in Hoi An was made extra special by staying in this hotel.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: The service was extremelly attentive and the breakfast was very generous. It offered so many options that it was difficult to decide every morning. The service was outstanding. When I asked for a little cake for my mum's birthday she got the whole bed dressed. It was very moving for her so massive thank you for that. The location is very good as well. It takes maximum 10 minutes to get to the historic centre and there are bicycles on offer if you want to venture to the beach.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: プールもあって、館内綺麗だし、スタッフも気にかけてくれた！
review.comment_negative: ちょっと料金高いかなあ？？

review.rating: Friendly and affordable luxury in Hoi An
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: Very nice and clean hotel (recently renovated) about five minutes’ walk from the Old Quarter. The rooms are super comfortable with lovely beds and staff go out of their way to make you feel welcome.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: The facility was great same with the breakfast. The best part about La Charm was the staff specifically Ngà. She showed me where to go on a map of Hoi An and helped book different tours. The dynamic between the staff employees makes for a very comfortable environment.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: Ένα ιδανικό ξενοδοχείο σε μια πολύ καλή τοποθεσία με ένα θαυμάσιο προσωπικό που θα κάνει την διαμονή σας αξέχαστη. Κάντε κράτηση χωρίς αμφιβολία σε αυτό το υπέροχο ξενοδοχείο και απολαύστε πολυτέλεια καθαριότητα και πολλά ζεστά χαμόγελα και εξυπηρέτηση από το καταπληκτικό προσωπικό.Επισης ο μπουφές με το πρωινό που σερβίρεται είναι εξαίσιο,πλούσιος και γευστικός
review.comment_negative: Δεν βρήκα τίποτα αρνητικό κατά την διαμονή μου

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: Personale var fantastiske, frokosten kunne ikke vært bedere. Rett og slett et flott hotel. Gangavstand til sentrum

review.rating: Une excellent adresse au calme à deux pas du vieux quartier

review.comment_positive: Accueil et toutes les petites attentions .. la piscine et salle de gym et surtout un fabuleux petit déjeuner 😀

review.comment_negative: The swimming pool area is bit small

review.comment_positive: Hyggelig og hjelpsomt personal, fint rom med veldig god seng (2,40m bred). Kort vei til sentrum, god frokost! Veldig god verdi for pengene.

review.comment_positive: Desayuno súper completo y excelente servicio, las habitaciones un poco pequeñas, pero con una cama muy grande y terraza muy cómoda. La muchacha de la atención turística muy atenta y preocupada por los que al hacerse de los turistas
review.comment_negative: Nada en específico. Sólo el espacio de las habitaciones, por si vas con maletas muy grandes.

review.room_type: Suite Thông Nhau Qua Cửa Nối
review.comment_positive: Location was perfect. The rooms were nice and clean. The staff were very friendly. Can’t vote anything with the hotel.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: We stayed at this place for 2 days. It's a great experience. The location is great, walking distance to everything. The room is very clean. Bed is really comfortable. The staff are very friendly and helpful. We felt very welcomed.

review.rating: Incredible hotel in Hoi An 100% would recommend
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: All around one of the best stays we’ve ever had! The staff were lovely and went above and beyond. The pool was amazing to relax during the hottest hours of the day. The rooms were clean and spacious. The breakfast buffet was really good and lots of different choices everyday! Also lots of vegetarian options!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ

review.rating: Cute hotel with a great atmosphere
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: Great atmosphere and decorations, nice staff, the gym is a little basic but good for Hoi An. It's on a relatively quiet street, a few minutes walk from the old town where there are plenty of restaurants, and you can always take a free bike and explore the entire city.
review.comment_negative: My biggest issues were that the hot water in the shower, while hot, wasn't hot enough to my taste. And the chair and desk aren't comfortable enough, since the desk is too short for the chair (or chair too high), and leaves very little room for the thighs. Other than that, everything was great!

review.rating: Great location to experience everything in Hoi An
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: Great value for money

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: The location is really close to old town, only a 5 minute walk and located on a nice walking street with local restaurants and convenience stores! The staff is super friendly and helpful, some of the best staff I have met! The breakfast is also very good!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: Amazing property and hospitability

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 3 Người/Gia Đình
Suite Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Ban Công & Tầm Nhìn Ra Toàn Cảnh
review.comment_positive:
Location, staff, food, showers.

Exceptional little hotel with fantastic staff. Very helpful, very polite and very genuine. We are a young family and our 1 year old was cherished and looked after. We arrived on the back of a bad air bnb so we're very relieved when we arrived. Ended up staying an extra 2 nights and if would of lived to stay longer. 5 minutes from old Town with easy access along quiet ricer walkway away from hectic roads.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: The staff were so friendly, helpful and kind. The room was great, very quiet, breakfasts were excellent. We borrowed the hotel bikes to ride to the beach, which was great fun. We also had a 30 minute neck, shoulder and back massage in the spa. Both me and my husband together with two masseurs. We wished we had booked in for an hour. It was definitely worth doing, we realised how many aches we had! There is drinking water available in the breakfast/dining room so you don't need to buy lots of plastic bottles.

review.rating: A group on a golf trip this hotel was perfect
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: The property is very clean the breakfast was great and if I owned a hotel I’d want the staff working for me they were fantastic

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: Top service, zeer vriendelijk personeel en voor een zeer scherpe prijs.

review.rating: The only hotel you should stay at in Hoi An
review.room_type: Suite Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Ban Công & Tầm Nhìn Ra Toàn Cảnh
review.comment_positive: The rooms, facilities and overall hotel is exceptional. Above the fantastic facility is the staff members, particularly Nga and Uyen. The staffs attention to detail, friendliness, help and knowledge about Hoi An made La Charm the best hotel we have stayed at in Vietnam.
review.comment_negative: There was nothing wrong with the property- we wish we could stay longer.

review.room_type: Suite Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Ban Công & Tầm Nhìn Ra Toàn Cảnh
review.comment_positive: The most amazing, friendly staff so helpful with everything, tours etc. The best Hotel we have stayed at on our travels. Great location. Free bicycles to enjoy the beauty of Hoi an.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: Staffs were super friendly and helpful. Quiet neighborhood,  charming hotel and good breakfast.

review.rating: Ideal Hoi An hotel to stay and close to old town and shops
review.room_type: Suite Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Ban Công & Tầm Nhìn Ra Toàn Cảnh
review.comment_positive: Everything. The staff at reception, restaurant and room service. We were a family of 10 from Grand parents to 8 year old. We had one partially in a wheelchair and the staff were so helpful. Great pool and refreshments.
review.comment_negative: The fact that we only stayed 3 nights

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: Our family loved everything about this hotel. Breakfast was excellent. Beds were comfortable. All staff were friendly and accommodating. Special mention to Ms. Thai, Mr. Hein, Ms. Hein A. and Ms. Hein B. who exceeded our expectations. Thank you for making our visit to Hoi An memorable. Would recommend this hotel to family and friends.
review.comment_negative: The fitness facility was only open between 9am and 9pm. It would have been nice if it's accessible 24hours.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: After our staying in this Hotel, I understand why they have very high rating. It's really brilliant Hotel 🏨

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: We really enjoyed our stay in La Charm Hotel in Hoi An. One of the best hotels I have stayed in so far! Our room was super cozy and comfortable, the staff very friendly and helpful (they gave us great recommendations and booked several tickets for us) and the breakfast was delicious. The location is perfect. To the ancient town it is only a 5 minutes walk. We definitely recommend the hotel for a stay in Hoi An.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive:
Quarto grande

Peut-être la baignoire de la salle de bain qui

Mais tout ceci n'est pas bien grave

review.rating: Great location, nice pool and great staff!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive:
The location of the hotell is great! Its very easy to walk down to hoi an old town and the thu bon river. La charm also has this lovely big pool where we hung out at during the early afternoon. You can also order pizza directly to the pool which was nice. We loved the breakfast, that was a buffe, not to mention the wonderful staff! Everyone was extremely nice and welcomming. We got a lot of help with the booking and navigating by ms. Loan, ms. Nga and ms. Duyen to name a few. 
Overall it was really amazing and we would totally recommend!!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: La Charm is a credit to manager Lucky and all staff working together to create excellence.

review.room_type: Suite Thông Nhau Qua Cửa Nối
review.comment_positive: Location was great and just a short walk away from the town centre. The staff were really friendly and helpful with booking tours and help around the town as well.

review.comment_positive:
L'hotel è dotato di camere ampie, letti comodissimi e bagni spaziosi. La piscina lunga e la palestra accessoriata completano il quadro. La colazione è ricca e il personale molto gentile e disponibile.
La posizione è ottimale perché poco fuori dalla città vecchia che tra locali e traffico è piuttosto caotica.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ

review.comment_positive: Было интересно узнать, что это такой за городской чудо-отель с таким высоким рейтингом. Отель приятный. В номере все исправно, хорошая постель, тихо ночью. Во дворе - уединенный бассейн и спа. Завтраки для отеля за такую цену – отличные. Есть бесплатные велосипеды. Все искала какие-то минусы, но не нашла)) на прощание персонал просит отзыв и дарит презент, поэтому все и пишут, видимо. Но и правда, нет претензий. Вот бы все городские отели были такими!
review.comment_negative: Окна отеля выходят на замороженную стройку – это ни на что не влияет, но было для меня удивлением. И еще на букинге был обещан ранний чек ин, но нам не сделали, так как тот номер (с апгрейдом, что нам приготовили) был не готов. Но в Хой ане это не страшно, мы отлично погуляли до чек Ина

review.comment_positive:
1. 飯店非常注重房客意見，每個人都很友善，還提供腳踏車，教我們如何用腳踏車鎖的男服務員也很親切。Nga 和Loan也給我們關於會安的旅遊建議，謝謝你們。

2. 床非常好睡，景很漂亮，泳池也很舒適！

review.comment_negative:

2. 早餐可能因為是開放式的，會有些小蟲在食物上飛來飛去，除此之外，早餐也好吃

review.rating: Beautiful hotel near Hoi An old town
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: We had a wonderful stay in La Charm Hoi An. The bedroom was lovely with a huge comfortable double bed, we had such a great sleep. The breakfast was great with a large selection of different foods and a hot food station. The staff were all so kind and helpful especially Ms Nga on reception who helped us book our onward journey. The hotel is just a short walk into the old town and it is a lovely walk along the river which we enjoyed but there is also the option of free bikes to cycle in. The gym was small but better than most hotels we have seen in Vietnam so far and the pool was lovely and refreshing.
review.comment_negative: The shower didn’t drain quickly and so the water rose and flowed into the rest of the bathroom.

review.rating: The perfect place for a stay in Hoi An - highly recommend!
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive:
Great location to spend time in Hoi An old town. 
Very friendly and welcoming staff, so kind, helpful and accommodating with lots of great suggestions for things to do and places to go. 
The swimming pool! Very long, clean and a good temperature. 
Free bike hire of good quality bikes and La Charm made it so easy to do, just stepping out the hotel and being helped to take a bike - we loved cycling to the beach (took about 30 mins each way).
Large and extremely comfortable bed and great shower. Also a free standing bath!
We spent most time out of the hotel exploring, but it was a great base to come back to and things we arranged with La Charm (like bikes, airport transfer, laundry) went very smoothly.

review.rating: Would absolutely stay here again and will recommend to friends.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: Fantastic location, clean, authentic, staff was friendly, helpful and made suggestions to local experiences. Had a few spa treatments that were relaxing. The breakfast buffet was over the top and we borrowed the bikes on property and rode through the rice fields to the beach and spent the afternoon at their sister property on the water which was gorgeous and recommended by staff. Highly recommend and would stay here again.

review.comment_positive: Un hotel muy bello, limpio y con todas las comodidades para tomarse un descanso, nosotros solos nos quedamos una noche pero el trato del personal fue siempre muy amable y servicial. Me motivaron a utilizar la bicicleta que son gratuitas y nos recomendaron tomar un tour en basket boat y fue la mejor recomendación. También se preocuparon del servicio de transporte, definitivamente volvería a quedarme con ellos.

review.comment_positive: Bardzo uprzejmy personel, bardzo różnorodne śniadanie, darmowa wypożyczalnia rowerów, blisko do starego miasta, ogólnie hotel warty polecenia.

review.rating: Hoi An is a beautiful location and hotel provided an excellent base.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive:
Excellent property and exceptional staff.  Very helpful team. 
Close to old town. 
Good pool, spa and gym - all modern equipment. 
Free use of bikes.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: Room was very spacious and clean. Bed was huge and comfy. The hotel decor was lovely and breakfast was yummy too. Location was only a few minute walk to the main attractions. We loved the local fruits and bought a lot which the hotel kitchen staff was kind enough to help cut and plated for us. Thanks so much to Duan!
review.comment_negative: My only complaint is that there was a bad smell possibly coming from the drain on and off in the bathroom during our stay.

review.room_type: Suite Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Ban Công & Tầm Nhìn Ra Toàn Cảnh
review.comment_positive: Hotellissa on poikkeuksellisen hyvä palvelu. Palvelusta tekee erinomaisen se, että asiakkaat ja heidän tarpeensa kohdataan yksilöllisesti. Koko henkilökunta tekee kaikkensa asiakkaiden tyytyväisyyden eteen ja siihen on henkilökuntaa selvästi koulutettu.
review.comment_negative: Vaikka huoneemme oli kuudennessa kerroksessa, en saanut nukuttua, koska naapurissa asuva kukko herätti joka päivä aamuyöllä. Meille tarjottiin kyllä huoneenvaihtoa, mutta en halunnut enää yhden yön vuoksi vaihtaa. Jos olet huonouninen, kannattaa ehkä pyytää huone sieltä puolelta, mihin kukon äänet eivät kuulu. Uloskirjautumisen yhteydessä hotellin henkilökunta painostaa asiakkaita arvostelemaan hotelli arvosanalla kymmenen ja vain kymmenen. Tästä ovat muutkin asiakkaat maininneet ja hotelli on vastannut, että kyseessä on väärinkäsitys. Kyseessä ei ole väärinkäsitys vaan tämä on hotellin systemaattista toimintaa. Hotelli on tarpeeksi hyvä saadakseen erinomaiset arvioinnit ilman painostustakin, mutta painostaminen jättää hotellista ikävän muiston.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: Ms Nga was extremely helpful and provided exceptional customer service. We arrived with no plans and she gave us lots of ideas and then when we had taken time and decided she helped us book everything. She then remembered us and out plans every time we saw her. This level of service was provided by all, for example when it started raining as we left the door man automatically handed us an umbrella. Exceptional service, comfortable bed, good shower and varied breakfast. Location is about 5-10 minute walk from the old town, which was perfect for us as it is a little away from all the noise but close enough to walk to everything.

review.rating: Beautiful and charming hotel and best service in the best location closed to HoiAn Old Quarters

review.comment_positive: We started our trip to Vietnam in Hoi An and it was the perfect location. Really clean, amazing breakfasts, extremely friendly staff and very relaxing (the double beds were huge and very comfortable). We'd recommend La Charm to anyone. Excellent value for money.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: Very welcoming and friendly staff who could help with whatever you needed. Very nice pool area, clean rooms and fantastic breakfast!

review.rating: Perfect place for your stay in Hoi An
review.room_type: Phòng Premium Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Ban Công & Tầm Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive: Fantastic hotel for your stay in Hoi An. Couldn’t fault the hotel. Location is perfect as are the facilities. Staff are amazing and super helpful for anything you need. Arranged a few things for us at great prices. Would highly recommend.

review.room_type: Suite Thông Nhau Qua Cửa Nối
review.comment_positive: The staff were very helpful with booking us tours and tickets with no additional fees. They were always smiley and friendly, especially with our kids which made it a happy stay for us all. The breakfast options were varied and yummy, as were the cocktails. The location was excellent for walking to ancient town and the night market whilst being away from the craziness/noise. We really appreciated the complementary bikes (of which 3 had kids seats for our little ones). The pool was the perfect temperature for me and there were plenty of comfy sunbeds available.
review.comment_negative: The rooms felt a little on the smaller side but still comfortable.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: I recently enjoyed a fantastic stay at this hotel. The room was spotlessly clean, and the breakfast was truly amazing. The staff at the reception were not only friendly but also incredibly helpful, providing excellent recommendations and going the extra mile to organize custom trips. The hotel's location is ideal – close to the center for convenience, yet perfectly situated to offer a peaceful atmosphere. It strikes the perfect balance, making it an excellent choice for a memorable and comfortable stay. Highly recommended!
review.comment_negative: If I really need to find something negative it would be that the breakfast has tons of salty options but few sweet ones.

review.room_type: Phòng Premium Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Ban Công & Tầm Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive: Ideal location, less than 5 minutes walk to the old town. Staff was very friendly and helpful and made us feel very welcome. Very nice atmosphere and a very charming hotel

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: Staff was amazingly friendly and caring. Clean and spacious  rooms, comfy bed. Breakfast with a lot of choices. Walking distance to ancient town. Quiet neighbourhood.

review.rating: The hotel was perfect in every way although it could have had less furniture in the room

The gym and pool was good, and location just a short stroll into old town - so you really do have it all.

review.comment_negative: 不算不喜歡，就是本來以為河景或更近一點而已

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: Υπέροχο ξενοδοχείο με εξαιρετικό και πολύ φιλικο προσωπικό. Μεγάλη ποικιλία στο πρωινό.Βρίσκεται σε μια ήσυχη τοποθεσία πολύ κοντά στην παλιά πόλη. Πόλη καλή επιλογή!
review.comment_negative: Θα προτιμούσα περισσότερες ευρωπαϊκές επιλογές στο πρωινό

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: Everything, the staff was amazing and very well looked after the hotel. Would recommend 200% for anyone looking for the utmost luxury in Hoi An.

review.comment_positive: Great facility, great breakfast options. Very close to Old Hoi An, short walk only. Stunning view of the surrounds.
review.comment_negative: Hotel recommended Tailor service that was more expensive than other Tailors in the village.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: Its an awesome property with very good location. The staff is very good and accomodative. This is a new hotel with very good spacious rooms. Food is very good being vegetarian they had so many options in vegetarians. For non vegetarians there are also so many options. The best thing i liked about the hotel was their staff. Every one is too welcoming. If you are staying in Ho ian i would recommend to stay in this hotel for sure

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
Suite Thông Nhau Qua Cửa Nối
Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: Absolutely wonderful hotel! Lovely staff, delicious breakfast, clean with great amenities. Would definitely recommend and stay again next time we visit Hoi an.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive:
I spent only 2 nights but really enjoyed Hoi An thanks to kind staff.
They arranged transportation, tour etc. then took care of every small concern.
The hotel, good variety of breakfast, walking distance to old town but not noisy at night.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 3 Người/Gia Đình
review.comment_positive: La ubicación del alojamiento es muy buena, apenas se oyen ruidos y las camas eran super cómodas. Las instalaciones que son modernas. Está todo muy limpio y siempre te atienden con una sonrisa, te dan soporte en todos los servicios que ofrece la ciudad, las excursiones, sitios donde comer, etc. Muy valorable el pago con tarjeta que nos facilitó bastante nuestra estancia. Por no hablar del desayuno que era variado y estaba buenísimo!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive:
We thoroughly enjoyed our stay in the hotel. After backpacking for 6 weeks so far this was a beautiful property to stay in. We were greeted with complementary drinks on arrival. The property was in an ideal location. Short walk to the night market and to old town. Lovely facilities including a fabulous pool and a small gym and spa. The hotel also provide free bikes to cycle around the town. 
Breakfast was 10/10 with so much options from Asian and western backgrounds. The property was very clean and the room was cleaned each day with fresh sheets and towels provided. 
Staff were fantastic, especially Loan who went out of her way to assist us. Loan helped us with booking of the cooking class and coconut boat tour alongside providing numerous recommendations for activities to do in Hoi An. 
Would highly recommend Le Charm for your visit to Hoi an.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: The staff are exceptional and meet your every demand. Close to all amenities and fantastic pool and facilities. Super clean , Booking again for September!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: Good hotel

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: Breakfast was good would have liked a little more European variety but overall good

review.comment_positive: Uno dei più belli hotel durante il mio viaggio, una stanza bellissima, lo staff gentilissimo, ho goduto della piscina in città e di un pranzo buonissimo! Colazione straordinaria con vastissima scelta! Ho fatto un bel giro in bici che si può prendere gratuitamente, a piedi facilissimo raggiungere il centro

review.rating: Loved my stay and would stay no where else when returning to Hoi An

Breakfasts were great and a very large selection
Swimming pool area was quite and clean and lively pool
The ladies at the Spa were caring and a nice selection of treatments 

Beautiful rooms with balcony and lovely large beds
Great shower

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ

Nga in particular went above and beyond helping us in all matters.

review.comment_positive: The location of the Hotel is excellent. Central but quiet. Only 5 mn on foot from old quarter. Free bicycle in good conditions, available. Staff very friendly, effective and helpful. Good size room. Excellent breakfast. Good value for money.

review.comment_positive:
The Hotel is nice and the location is awesome. 
Breakfast was good. 
The room was clean and the bed was comfortable.
review.comment_negative:
I actually wanted to give a 9 out of 10 rating but then the hotel manager came to us and ask us about our stay and we said that it was good with minor issues. The Wifi could be a bit better and the room door lock was jammed in the night, but the staff find a quick solution for the problem. 
So when she ask us, how many starts we would give her we said 9/10. Then she came to me and wanted to give me 200k discount if I give them a 10/10 rating on Booking.com. 
I declined the offer because that’s a NO GO for me. 
That’s also the reason why I give them now 7/10.

review.rating: An amazing place - we didn’t want to leave!

review.comment_positive: The staff were amazing, the facilities were all great - the restaurant and spa were incredible. Nothing was too much trouble. Just a short walk to the old town. We thoroughly recommend this lovely hotel.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: I loved the location and the ambiance of the hotel. It is close to the town center, but at the right distance to not be disturbed by noise. We had plenty of options at breakfast, with local and international food choices. The bed was super comfy. Extra points for having free bicycles which guests can use, we went to the beach and around the town.

review.rating: Incredible, will definitely be back here!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ

review.comment_positive: Eine super Lage. Sehr nettes Personal. Sehr leckeres Frühstück.
review.comment_negative: Die dünnen Fenster, man konnte von draußen einiges hören…

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive:
距離熱鬧的老城區很近..飯店有提供自行車租借..騎自行車可以優閒地到達老城區的所有區域..
如果不想騎車.步行也可到達..
飯店工作人員很細心.從出發前跟我們確認房型及接送問題..
抵達後介紹所有設施及附近觀光景點及注意事項..
甚至退房後還提供我們自行車及沐浴更衣處所...
臨走前送我們當地特產餅乾作為伴手禮...
review.comment_negative: 電視訊號有點模糊...雖然我們看不太懂內容!~~哈哈!~~

review.rating: Do yourself a favour and book Là Charm for your stay in Hoi An

review.comment_positive:
A recently refurbished boutique hotel located on the edge of the ancient town with good staff,comfy beds & a decent breakfast spread.
Had a 5AM checkout due to an early flight and was provided with a breakfast pack to take away

review.rating: Superbe hôtel avec un accueil des plus chaleureux.

Le petit déjeuner est copieux et très bon.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 3 Người/Gia Đình

review.comment_positive:

Bonne literie.
Propreté de l'établissement.
Petit déjeuner copieux.
Mise à disposition gratuite de vélos pour se déplacer en ville ou rejoindre la plage de An Bang.
La gentillesse et l'efficacité du personnel de l'hôtel
review.comment_negative:
L'éclairage dans la chambre pourrait être amélioré.
Pour justifier la présence d'une TV, offrir un choix de chaînes plus important (il n'y avait que 2 chaînes de TV)

review.rating: Inoubliable et parfait pour terminer notre séjour au Vietnam

review.comment_negative: nous avons tout apprécié à sa juste valeur

review.comment_positive: Very eager to please, proactive. Excellent bed and shower. Spa was very good and staff cared for my husband while sick. Could use a little finesse in the dining room but that was minor. Would absolutely stay again.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive:
I was traveling as solo and this has been the most great experience in Vietnam. The staff is super amazing , the food is super delicious, the spa and massages very good ! 
A very special thank you to the guy Tinh that assisted me during one of the night as I didn’t feel good and he has been so welcoming and professional. I will never say enough thank you to him and to all the staff for all the suggestions regarding the activities too.
Unforgettable experience. 5/5 for everything!

review.rating: Lovely place with the best service
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: The service was amazing, from our initial booking all the way through to when we left the staff were so helpful. The rooms and facilities are great, particularly for the price. But it is perhaps the best and most sincere service I have ever experienced.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 3 Người/Gia Đình

review.rating: The best place to stay in Hoi An
review.room_type: Suite Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Ban Công & Tầm Nhìn Ra Toàn Cảnh
review.comment_positive: Location amazing! Staff amazing-informative, helpful- they went the extra mile to be helpful on any request

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive:
Clean, spacious room, and the staff is welcoming and helpful. The location is great for exploring the old town.
Breakfast was excellent, with a lot of choice. On the last day, we were late for breakfast due to a misunderstanding. The staff immediately stopped cleaning and allowed us to take the food and eat in peace. Really appreciated.

review.room_type: Suite Thông Nhau Qua Cửa Nối
review.comment_positive: Las instalaciones son perfectas, muy bonitas y muy bien cuidadas. El personal del hotel muy atento en todo momento y te ayudan en todo lo que necesitas. En especial, mencionar a Mr. Chinh Dang, fue todo un placer conocerle y contar con él para nuestras salidas, nos solucionó todo lo que necesitábamos y mucho más! Todo perfecto!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: We loved La Charm, and our stay. ms Nga and the whole staff were exceptional. The room and bed were very comfortable, and the pool was great. Best stay in Vietnam.

review.rating: Lovely Boutique Hotel in Great Location
review.room_type: Phòng Premium Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Ban Công & Tầm Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive: A lovely boutique hotel in easy walking distance to old town and with good bikes to use, lovely staff, good breakfast and very comfy beds!

review.room_type: Suite Thông Nhau Qua Cửa Nối
review.comment_positive: It is a beautiful hotel. Breakfast spread was good. We had 2 very comfortable and spacious rooms with balconies. Staffs were attentive to my booking and contacted me prior to my stay to see if I need any assistance. We were greeted with smiles when we arrived and we were given an overview of the city of Hoi An and what the hotel offers. Staffs helped us beyond our trip in Hoi An. It is very conveniently located within a quiet street. We enjoyed the free bicycles use too. Looking forward to staying here again!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: They are so kind and very helpful. The room is very clean and comfortable.

review.room_type: Suite Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Ban Công & Tầm Nhìn Ra Toàn Cảnh
review.comment_positive: Great location, staff were great and rooms were nice and clean

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: La vicinanza al quartiere vecchio è eccezionale, l'accoglienza dello staff impeccabile. Le stanze sono ampie e la colazione super fornita.

review.rating: Had everything we needed pluse close to main attractions
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: Breakfast had lots of choice, staff were very helpful and went out of they way. The pool and spa area was looked really nice plus the property was in easy walking distance to shops,  tailors and restaurants

review.rating: Gorgeous hotel - made our stay in Hoi An memorable
review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Thời Thượng Có Ban Công & Tầm Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive: It was a beautiful hotel with a lovely welcoming feeling and super helpful staff.  I would 100% recommend- probably our favourite hotel in Vietnam. review.rating: Had a great time at La Charm, where the staff went the extra mile to ensure we had a good stay.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: The staff at La Charm were incredibly helpful and polite from check-in to check-out. During our stay they were always willing to provide suggestions of activities, and were very helpful in booking tours and assisting with out flights. The pool area and garden was lovely to spend time in. Although the pool is a bit chilly in winter, it was still good for swimming, and the floating breakfast adds a touch of luxury to the stay at La Charm. The room we stayed in was spacious and clean, with a very large bed. The bathroom was also spacious, with a shower and bath. The shower had good temperature and water pressure.
review.comment_negative: The rooms are not very sound-proof, and you can often hear staff/other visitors outside the room early in the morning, as well as a lot of noise from the streets and surrounds. The door to the balcony cannot be fully closed from the outside. The bed was large and comfortable, however an additional pillow per person would have been good.

Daarnaast was de tour desk heel behulpzaam. We hebben hier meerdere tours en transfers geboekt, tegen goede prijzen. Andere hotels waar we hebben verbleven probeerden juist meer te vragen dan online voor tours. Het personeel was vriendelijk en behulpzaam.

The staff are outstanding with above ‘the rest’ customer service. Very friendly, easy to understand and ensure you have everything you need the moment you walk in the door. The hotel and rooms are very clean and super presentable.

review.comment_negative: The only small issue is that the pool wasn't very cold, so it wasn't very refreshing when trying to escape the Hoi An heat.

review.rating: Above and Beyond Service and the most comfortable beds and lavish breakfast in Vietnam
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 3 Người/Gia Đình
review.comment_positive:
Unforgettable Stay at La Charm Hotel, Hoi An

From the moment we checked into La Charm Hotel, it was clear we were in for a treat. The beds were not just comfortable, they were like sleeping on a cloud, ensuring a restful night's sleep after a day of exploring Hoi An. What truly set this hotel apart was the service; the staff went above and beyond in every interaction, making us feel both valued and cared for.

Located conveniently away from the bustling noise, the hotel offers a serene retreat. Each morning, we were greeted with an unbelievably delicious breakfast, featuring a wide variety of choices that tantalized our taste buds and energized us for the day.

The staff deserve a special mention for their friendliness and efficiency. Their quick service and the overall cleanliness of the hotel were commendable. As for the price, it was more than fair, especially considering the high level of service and the quality of the accommodations.

Our family room, which comfortably accommodated three people, was a highlight. Spacious and well-appointed, it catered to our every need. The hotel’s communication, from booking to check-out, was very clear and responsive, ensuring a hassle-free experience.

In summary, La Charm Hotel is a gem in Hoi An. With its combination of comfort, service, and value, it's an ideal choice for travelers seeking a memorable stay in this charming city.
review.comment_negative: While we did notice the wifi was somewhat weak, this minor inconvenience was overshadowed by the hotel's numerous positives.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ

review.rating: Perfect stay , very helpfull highly recommend

review.comment_positive: El alojamiento, aunque no está en el centro de Hoi An, es perfecto para pasar unos días en la ciudad. Todos los empleados son muy amables y está muy limpio. La cama es comodísima y el desayuno buffet muy completo.

review.comment_positive: Very close to Hoi An ancient town, comfortable beds, good breakfast, staff were extremely helpful and hospitable. Travelled with 3 children and they were very accommodating with extra cot and tour bookings. Highly recommend.

review.comment_positive:

なにより、朝食が　品数多くて　　スタッフは、みなさん笑顔で親切!
トイレも、紙がそのまま流せて　びっくり！　ほんとうに快適!　帰りに　お土産まで　頂いて　ホイアンに来たら、また泊まりたいと思います😊

review.comment_positive:
Great location, close to everything! Free bycicle ! Amazing buffet breakfast! Great staff ...at check in they take the tome to explain you everything about the town and are always ready to help you! The rooms are spacious and well decorated, super clean! Great value for your money. 
When they knew I am allergic to gluten, they prepare something soecisl for me...thank you very much!
review.comment_negative: Just a suggestion for buffet breakfast is to have more options for gluten free.

review.rating: A real gem just a stones throw away from old town
review.room_type: Suite Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Ban Công & Tầm Nhìn Ra Toàn Cảnh
review.comment_positive: The location, the staff and how clean the room was! What a lovely place. We have been travelling for over 4 weeks and felt like we were home. The staff are just so friendly and helpful. Even though this was our 2nd visit to Hoi An, the staff member at check in talked abt some hidden gems. Every single one of her recommendations were fabulous and we soon realised every single member right from the door man to the staff at the reception or the restaurant were just fantastic. And a big round of applause to the person who serviced our room. It not just smelt good but was the cleanest room we stayed in our last 4 weeks. If we ever come back this is where we will be returning to. Thank you all.

review.comment_positive: We LOVED our stay here ! This is a really great hotel with comfy beds, located near the old town. The reception staff was really kind and helped us a lot with many nice suggestions for where to go and what to see. The cleaning was also superb, our rooms were spot clean. Breakfast was amazing, it had a huge variety of choices, and everything was tasty. We also took a massage and the masseurs at the spa were great and really kind. I highly recommend this hotel.

The bountiful breakfast buffet was fantastic with both Asian and Western options. The pool looked really nice (my spouse said it was cold, but he enjoyed his swim). Others in my family used the massage services at the spa and were very satisfied. Wish we had more time to enjoy the outside patio and facilities.

review.comment_positive: Everything was absolutely perfect! Great location, just 5 minute walking from the old city. The hotel is amazing, super clean and room super comfortable with everything you may need in the room. Great breakfast. Free bicycle you can take in the hotel to ride around. But the most important thing is that all the staff is really amazing. They make us feel like home. They provided us all the information we needed and suggested us a lot of thing to do and tour around. They kindly supported us with a problem we had with our bus to Hue. A special thanks to Dang and Loan. I can say that we found two new friend in Hoi An and as Dang said us today, “there’s never goodbye” because we really wish to meet them soon again!

Pool was great too.

The staff were very friendly and helpful, we always got immediate support when we need. We booked the Hoian memories tour and Water Coconut forest tour with them, very convenient. I can’t recommend enough, and would love to go back again. Ah, not forget to mention that the price is very reasonable.

review.comment_positive:
Was unwell during my stay in Hoi An and i was glad to be staying in a beautiful, comfy room for my recovery. The bed was clean and super comfy and the bath was god.sent. I loved the balcony also which allowed for the much needed fresh air. 
Such a great range for beakfast.
The staff was lovely and helpful. Was very accomodating.
Would stay again for my next visit. Recommend.

review.rating: The best place to stay in Hoi An!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: An amazing stay from start to finish. The staff couldn’t do enough for us, from recommending activities and tailors, to booking us an excellent cooking class with pickup and drop off at the hotel. The facilities are excellent, and include a brand new spotless gym and good sized swimming pool, along with comfortable double sun beds for relaxing by the pool. The room was spotless and cleaned daily, and was also modern and spacious with a balcony. Breakfast was excellent with a wide range of options from sushi to croissants as well as freshly cooked omelettes! This was the best hotel we stayed at in Vietnam and was the perfect place to relax at night after exploring Hoi An by day. Thank you especially to Ms Nha who always made sure we were okay and asked if she could help us with anything!

review.rating: Absolute Empfehlung: super Hotel in zentraler Lage.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: Sehr schönes Hotel in zentraler Lage (in der Nähe der Altstadt von Hoi An). Das Hotel ist sehr sauber, das Frühstücksbuffet ist vielfältig, reichlich, frisch, lecker und bietet viele vegetarische Optionen. Das Hotel bietet einen kleinen schönen Garten mit Pool zum entspannen vom Getümmel in der Stadt. Alle wichtigen Sehenswürdigkeiten und Anlaufstellen der Altstadt sind fußläufig zu erreichen oder per kostenlosem Fahrradverleih vom Hotel. Trotz der zentralen Lage ist das Hotel ruhig und läd zum entspannen ein. Auch Ausflüge und Aktivitäten können über das Hotel organisiert werden. Alles tip top! Absolute Empfehlung!
review.comment_negative: Während unseres Aufenthalts gab es im Nachbargebäude eine Baustelle, auf der recht früh gearbeitet wurde. Um den Pool gibt es nur wenige Schattenplätze.

review.rating: A perfect place in Hoi an
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: Everything, a special thanks to all the staff who was extremely nice all the time! Also the breakfast, the pool and the Vietnamese massage were amazing!!

review.rating: Best place to stay in Hoi An
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: We loved everything. It was the best place we stayed at during our 3 weeks in Vietnam. The rooms were great, staff were helpful and efficient and the breakfast was delicious and varied.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ

review.comment_positive:
Camas cómodas, desayuno variado, personal eficiente y dispuesto a ayudar en todo momento.
La ubicación cercana al centro de Hoi An 10 minutos a ritmo de paseo. Contratamos con ellos los transfers al aeropuerto y una excursión a Bana Hills y Montaña de Mármol, chofer de 10: excelente.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive:
Was an absolute lovely stay with La Charm. The location is great it’s a 5 minuet walk into the old town, but tucked away it’s not too noisy. The hotel also felt really clean, and there were a lot of choices for breakfast. Staff were really friendly and helpful too we booked our tour guides with them, the spa was also really nice and relaxing. 
We actually stayed for 4 nights and we felt it was the perfect amount of time, the hotel also decorated our bedroom and gave us a little cake for my birthday! Which was a lovely gesture and surprise!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: El personal muy amable, en especial Ms Loan que se preocupó de introducirnos la ciudad y que nuestra estadía fuese perfecta.

review.rating: Highly recommend for a relaxing and comfortable stay in Hoi An!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: La Charm was the perfect stay in Hoi An. From the moment we booked, the staff went out of their way to be helpful and accommodating, suggesting activities for us to do and answering any questions we had. The hotel itself is really beautiful - breakfast was great too. The pool was perfect for relaxing by after a day spent walking around the streets of Hoi An. 10/10 recommend!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive:
Had a fantastic time at La charm.
From the moment we got there the hotel experience was different. The check in was personal away from the desk and everything was explained including laundry and spa services. A suitcase full of clothes washed and pressed for 5-6 dollars. We got advice on where to go and a map to help us get around. 
Breakfast was excellent, fresh delicious food bits to suits everyone. 
Spa service was excellent me and my friend got a mani pedi which we don’t normally do but very cheap and very worth it.
Whilst originally only supposed to stay one night I extended twice to 4 nights total, and each time they were accommodating, managing to always keep our room despite clearly being busy.

I have to say a big thank you to Ms Thao and all the staff for easily one of the best hotel stays I’ve had, never once saw them without a genuine smile on their faces!

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Thời Thượng Có Ban Công & Tầm Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive: Le charm was absolutely gorgeous! Great service, staff were so friendly and went above and beyond with explaining and providing quality service. We were given a free room upgrade which we were very grateful for. Beds were so comfortable and room itself was perfect and spacious. Balcony was beautiful we will definitely choose this hotel when coming back to Hoi An. Great location!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: Sự nhiệt tình của nhân viên

review.comment_positive: Phòng ốc khá sạch, vị trí gần các khu mua sắm.

review.room_type: Phòng Premium Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Ban Công & Tầm Nhìn Ra Sông

review.rating: Es war alles bestens, wir wurden nett begrüßt, persönlich zum Zimmer begleitet, Personal war herzlich und zuvorkommend,
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive:
Mein Aufenthalt in diesem Hotel war einfach großartig!

Die Zimmer waren wunderschön und super bequem, so dass ich mich gleich wie zu Hause fühlte. Die Dekoration im gesamten Hotel schuf eine wunderbar entspannte Atmosphäre, perfekt zum Entspannen während meines Urlaubs.

Der Poolbereich war ein Juwel, mit schönen Liegen, um die Sonne zu genießen. Es war der ideale Ort, um sich zurückzulehnen und die ruhige Umgebung zu genießen.

Was dieses Hotel wirklich herausragend machte, war das außergewöhnlich freundliche und hilfsbereite Personal. Sie haben nicht nur meinen Check-in problemlos gestaltet, sondern boten auch Unterstützung bei der Buchung von Touren, Veranstaltungen und Fahrern direkt an der Rezeption an. Ich war angenehm überrascht zu erfahren, dass ihre Preise oft budgetfreundlicher waren als unabhängige Buchungen.

Die Lage des Hotels war perfekt - ruhig und dennoch zentral, was einen einfachen Zugang zu allen Sehenswürdigkeiten ermöglichte, ohne den Lärm des Stadtzentrums. Zusätzlich war die Tatsache, dass sie kostenlose Fahrradverleih anbieten, ein fantastischer Bonus, der es mir ermöglichte, die Umgebung in meinem eigenen Tempo zu erkunden.

Ich kann dieses Hotel nicht genug empfehlen; es hat meinen Aufenthalt wirklich unvergesslich gemacht. Ich werde definitiv bei meinem nächsten Besuch wiederkommen!

review.room_type: Phòng Premium Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Ban Công & Tầm Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive: Great location- easy walk to old town, Great staff- super friendly and helpful

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive:
The staff are amazing and the location is great. The breakfast was awesome and the pool is a really nice spot to relax in.
I can’t recommend this place enough, they work so hard to make your stay perfect!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: Sängen var underbar och stor. Badrummet med dusch och separat badkar var även jätte trevligt! Personalen var super trevliga och var service minded. Jag var sjuk på resan så dem var väldigt hjälpsamma med att hitta sjukvård och erbjuda sig att göra te. Fick även present när vi checka ut.
review.comment_negative: Kycklingarna/tuppen som börjar låta från 03:00. Ingen ordentligt sömn.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive:
飯店人員親切友善，英文溝通沒問題！
飯店建築風格古色古香，房內空間很大，床很大很好睡！隔音很好，環境乾淨明亮，廁所空間大還有浴缸可以泡澡放鬆～
入住三天吃了兩次早餐，兩天早餐的熟食品項有些不同且多樣，味道都很不錯，外國人也喜歡的口味唷！
整體CP值超高的！！！下次再訪會安也會再選擇這間飯店！
review.comment_negative:
蓮蓬頭水柱力道有點弱。
附近有飼養公雞，早上四點多會聽到公雞叫聲。

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: This is the best hotel that we have stayed in our recent trip to Central Vietnam. La Charm is a lovely and nicely decorated medium size boutique hotel, with 60+ rooms. Spa, Gym and a nice swimming pool are awesome ! The location is strategic, only 5 minutes walk from the Ancient Town. All the staff are well trained, attentive and efficient. The rooms are very clean, spacious and with balconies. You can rent the bicycle for free to go around the suburb of Hoi An. Highly recommended.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Thời Thượng Có Ban Công & Tầm Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi

Very good value for money 
Location good
Staff very good

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: Breakfast amazing!!!!

review.rating: Hotel perfetto per visitare hoi an , ma anche per long stays
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: Pulizia e attenzione a ogni piccolo dettaglio , aree comuni inclusa la piscina sempre ordinate e pulite , piscina un po’ piccola ma rilassante nei pomeriggi più caldi .I letti enormi con lenzuola sempre bianche e profumate .UN PLUS CHE FA LA DIFFERENZA, IL PERSONALE CHE CON IL SORRISO È SEMPRE PRESENTE PER OGNI ESIGENZA ! VIcinanza al centro , bici gratis , spa professionale a costi giusti , bar e ristorante top ! Che dire ? Bravissimi

review.rating: The perfect place to stay in Hoi An

review.comment_positive: The property is conveniently located outside the busiest part of Hoi An, but is less than 5 minutes on foot from the main touristic part. The room was also very spacious.
review.comment_negative: Everything was what we expected plus some positive surprises with the amazing staff.

review.rating: A wonderful stay very close to the old quarter with fabulous customer service.
review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Thời Thượng Có Ban Công & Tầm Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive: An absolutely lovely hotel very well equipped and perfectly located very close to the old quarter. Free bikes which were fabulous to ride to the beach. Amazing customer service. Nothing was too much trouble - the customer service team organised our day tours and even booked an internal flight we needed to get to our next destination. On our departure we were handed free cappuccinos and coconut biscuits to take on our journey.  I cannot recommend this hotel more highly.

Friendly & prompt customer service, room sizes were comfortable and spacious, breakfast buffet was delicious and had a lot of variety, location is perfectly situated for walking distance to the walking/biking street, everything was clean and well kept. 

Me & my family had a great time staying here 🙂 everyone was really pleased with the place.

review.rating: Wonderful hotel, made Hoi An extra special
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive:
I have stayed in many hotels in Vietnam  and this was my absolute favourite. Firstly, the staff are incredible. So friendly and helpful. They advised us about the Bamboo circus and arranged tickets for us, and this ended up being a highlight of our trip to Hoi An. They also gave advice on things to do and tours available, and arranged anything we wanted to do. This was all at no extra cost


The pool was lovely, it's very quiet in the day so you can get a sun lounger, and there is lots of shade. Thr beach towels thsy provide were great. I loved the pool area, it's a decent length as well - about 18 metres.

For us the location of the hotel was perfect, away from the hustle and bustle of the old town but only a short walk away. Really loved the bikes that the hotel had available (for free), we used these to cycle to An Bang beach

Our room was huge and had a balcony. The hotel is spotlessly clean too.

There was a wide range of options at breakfast, and I liked the egg station very much. 

Thank you to Ms Thao and the team, you made our stay really special and I was sad to leave.

review.comment_positive: The location is great, you can walk easily to the Old Town area. Breakfast was diverse and delicious. We asked the reception about a tour to My Son in the middle of the night and still they were assisting us with such hospitality and excellent knowledge about the area! We felt really good staying there knowing the staff took care of us very well. Additionally the spa was amazing!! Great services tailored according to your needs even at the last minutes!

review.rating: The perfect hotel for a Hoi An visit

Large, comfortable and well lit room with a balcony.
Bikes that you can borrow at any time to get around. 
Located slightly off the main town, making it a nice quiet getaway.
Breakfast had large variety and fun friendly tourists.

The coffee and baked breads could have been a bit better.

review.rating: Very nice, clean and comfortable hotel. Double room was a great size. Very close to old town in Hoi Ann. Staff were exce

Lage sehr zentral neben der Old Town und es können kostenlos Fahrräder ausgeliehen werden.

Two big lifts always a help. The shower in the bathroom is superb. This is the place to be in Hoi An.

review.comment_positive:
Beautiful cozy hotel located at walking distance from night market and Old town. Staff is extremely courteous, willing to assist with all queries and not pushy. Special mention to Miss Thao at reception who was very kind and helpful. Quick service provided for anything requested. Good buffet breakfast. I was given a free upgrade to the Room with a panoramic view of the city and it was absolutely gorgeous! 
Totally value for money! Definitely recommend ☺️

review.comment_positive: The hotel is in a great location about 5 minute walk to the centre of Hoi An. The staff are excellent, all tours and transport can be organised from the front desk. Bicycles out front can be used freely to explore the area. We really enjoyed the pool and the cocktails.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive:
Das La Charm Hotel in Hoi An liegt nahe an den Attraktionen der Altstadt und des Flusses und trotzdem sehr ruhig.
Komfortable Zimmer mit guten Betten und ein langer Pool mit gemütlichem Außenbereich  gehören zu diesem gepflegten Hotel.
Insbesondere möchten wir den hervorragenden Service betonen. Wir hatten sowohl bei den Tickets für An-/Abreise und Unternehmungen  als auch für medizinische Hilfe kompetente und umfassend freundliche Unterstützung. 
Wir können das Hotel voll umfänglich empfehlen.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: Rất tuyệt vời nhân viên thân thiện khách sạn đẹp tiện nghi ăn sáng bể bơi

review.rating: Outstanding and Quality Choice in Hoi An, close to everything and exceptional rooms and service
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: This was the most lovely hotel to stay at - the rooms were beautiful, spacious and well cleaned and even though one of our rooms was upgraded, it was bigger rather than any better than the other.  The buffet breakfast was outstanding - they do host tours so it can be busy at times.  The pool was really cooling on a hot day and the area well maintained with pool towels and drinks available.  There are free bicycles outside to use and super friendly and helpful reception will book you anything you'd like to do and suggest options for sightseeing, tailors, etc.  You can easily walk a short distance to the main tourist areas of Hoi An, but this hotel is in a quieter part of town.  We really felt like they wanted to ensure our stay was exceptional and they succeeded.
review.comment_negative: There is a building site next to the pool, but I think they played a watery noise to ensure it wasn't really a problem.  The property isn't on online maps so screenshot or take the address to show it to taxi drivers, etc. - I believe they're addressing this issue.

review.room_type: Suite Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Ban Công & Tầm Nhìn Ra Toàn Cảnh
review.comment_positive: Good location, exceptionally helpful staff, excellent breakfast.
review.comment_negative: Gym facilities simplistic, equipment rather uncomfortable to use. Sound isolation also subpar - we could hear unusually loud noises from the outside, from the corridor, from other rooms. Overall a few small things to improve on.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ

Facility was good, rooms were clean and breakfast was amazing. They are also located only minutes from the old town. You can walk or use their bike to explore the town.  Highly recommend!!

El hotel es espectacular, está muy bien ubicado, las habitaciones son amplias y nuevas la decoracion es bonita. El desayuno está delicioso,desayuno europeo y asiatico la piscina está  genial  también el personal es muy amable. Especial agradecimiento a Mrs. NGA, por ocuparse de mandar mis postales.

Me dieron un pequeño detalle al hacer el check out. Sin duda de los.mejores hoteles en los que nos hemos hospedado en Vietnam.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive:
Had an amazing stay at La Charm. The place is gorgeous and very clean, rooms are large. The breakfast spread is huge and ranges from viet faves to western. 10-15 min walk away from the main river area where the night market is. Pretty pool lounging area. The service level and english for fromt counter staff is very good

The best part of La Charm is the staff. Everyone from reception to bellboy, They are so warm and happy. This is why I prefer smaller, more intimate ( independent?) places. Manager tells me this is a 7 year hotel that was closed for 2 years due to covid, so now they are so grateful to be back. It’s spanking new at 2 months, even the gym equipment has its protective jackets on. As a result, the current prices at sep 2023 are so ridiculously low. I’ve never seen anyth at this quality level for the price in vietnam. The new spa is also doing a one for one currently (up to usd30 for 2 hrs..so i went everyday) , big shoutout to masseuse song for accomodating all my needs and pains, which didn’t happen when i went to a much more expensive spa nearby
review.comment_negative: Currently at sep 2023 there is some construction just across the road. Its bearable and ok, no banging but those sensitive to sounds could avoid the corner rooms facing the road. They haven’t got all operations details, the niceties touches all worked out yet but you can tell they are really working on it & listening. Beyond excellent stay. In vietnam & when travelling tho, it’s always wise to keep your valuables close

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: The staff were all exceptional , friendly and extremely helpful.
review.comment_negative: Some of the hotel guests were noisy. Poor soundproofing

review.rating: Super nice stay in Hoi An.
