review.rating: Clean and comfy - perfect stay just outside old town
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive:
We had a very nice stay in La Charm Hotel. The staff is very nice and curteous. 
The hotel is very clean and situated right outside the old city - you can reach everything in walking distance and yet it is calm outside.
The laundry service was very quick and clean, we could rent a scooter for a very good price, it also has bikes for you. 
The pick-up at Da Nang train station worked without problems.
We couldn't enjoy the breakfast, because the bed (largest bed we ever saw) was too comfy :)

Thank you very much! And thank you Ms. Loan for taking care of us!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: Everything!  It was absolutely perfect from the moment we arrived. The reception was amazing, the room was beautiful, the staff were extremely friendly and the breakfast was above expectations.   Would love to visit again!

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Thời Thượng Có Ban Công & Tầm Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive: Posizione eccellente vicino alla vita notturna di Hoi An, stanze pulite e colazione eccellente. Staff gentilissimo e disponibile per ogni richiesta.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive:
The staff is outstanding. From the second you arrive until the transfer to the next location. Perfect English, very knowledgeable and attentive. 
Also the hotel itself is very nice. The breakfast hits the sweet spot of authentic local cuisine and something for every taste. Bicycles can be rented for free from the hotel. The location of the hotel is also great, right next to the old town. 
I can highly recommend La Charm, many Thanks to Ms. Nga for taking such great care of us during our stay

review.comment_positive: We loved our stay. It was such a gorgeous hotel. The staff were so friendly and helpful, ideal location, beautiful pool with lovely furniture around it, excellent buffet breakfast. It was like a 5 star resort. Our mattress was so comfortable and soft! We would definitely stay again! Thank you so much for having us.
review.comment_negative: The room for the 3 of us was fairly small.

review.comment_positive: Everything! The staff had amazing English, so caring and kind, so cheerful and happy. Breakfast was AMAZING, sadly having such an amazing breakfast here we were very let down at every other accommodation as nothing compared. The pool was warm, so the adults all went in, pool is big, delicious cocktails, plenty of lounges by the pool. Can order drinks and food to have by the pool. Room was so clean, hotel smelt beautiful as soon as we walked in. Very clean. Perfect location, walking distance to everything. Scooter hire next door. Massage parlours all close by

Hotel maravilhoso! Muito bem localizado, dá para ir andando facilmente para o centro. Eles também fornecem bicicletas gratuitas para passear. Café da manhã muito bom! 
Funcionários muito atenciosos, sempre sorridentes, deram várias dicas de como aproveitar Hoi An. Quartos extremamente limpos e confortáveis. Tivemos que sair antes do café da manhã para o aeroporto e eles forneceram um lanche para viagem. Melhor hotel que ficamos no Vietnã!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: Everything was great! We got a great clean room with a nice bathroom. The view was amazing from the balcony. The pool area is also quite inviting to relax. The breakfast buffet is huge from fried noodles to any type of egg to fruits and salad. The personelle was always really nice and helpful with any questions we had.

review.rating: Best hotel we stayed in Vietnam

review.comment_positive: I cannot recommend this hotel enough. I was suspicious of all the perfect reviews but after staying there I totally understand. Amazing staff, rich breakfast, great location, amenities and service, everything just made our stay perfect. By far the best hotel we stayed in Vietnam.

review.rating: staff very kind , the hotel look like the photos and also the location perfect , i will definitely comeback

review.comment_positive: Our stay at the hotel was exceptional. The design of the hotel beautifully incorporated traditional Vietnamese style, with elegant decor and intricate details that created a warm and inviting atmosphere. We had a room with an incredible design, which made our stay truly special. The hotel's location was perfect, situated close to the old town, allowing us to easily explore local culture and also enjoying our time, they also offer a free bicycle so you can discover Hoi an. Ms Thào was very helpful in organizing our activities and ensuring everything went smoothly and she even gave us a lovely gift a local coconut biscuit. The staff was also very accommodating, preparing a takeaway breakfast for us, which we greatly appreciated

review.rating: Ett lyxigt boende, verkligen mycket bra och PRISVÄRT!

review.comment_positive:
Las habitaciones son muy cómodas y el desayuno es el mejor de toda nuestra estancia, es quizá el más occidental y tiene de todo.
El staff es muy agradable y te ayuda en todo momento. 
Aconsejo reservar con ellos las excursiones, sobretodo a la impression memory island tienen mejor precio y es espectacular.

review.rating: The hotel is great and it was a really pleasant stay!
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 3 Người/Gia Đình
review.comment_positive: The room is clean and quite spacious. The bathroom is big with a shower and a tub. The hotel is about 10 mins walk from the Ancient town. The staffs are friendly and helpful. They will help you to book a Grab or taxi to take you to your destination, and I was thankful for that as most drivers can't really communicate in English. The breakfast spread is very good and the menu changes everyday for the 3 days we were there. They have bicycles if you prefer to cycle to the town.
review.comment_negative: The shower floor was really slippery when wet, so it was quite dangerous for my elderly relatives. We had to use one of the bedroom flip-flops as a bathroom slipper. Perhaps the hotel can provide a bathroom slipper or put an anti-slip mat.

review.rating: We loved Hoi An and this hotel was the iving on the cake!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: Everything was better than expectations., from the lobby to the dining areas, the room, staff, location. Wonderful helpful & welcoming staff. Breakfast was superb.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: Khách sạn khá gần khu phố cổ, có thể đi bộ hoặc đi xe đạp để tham quan. Khách sạn cung cấp xe đạp miễn phí. Đồ ăn sáng ngon, đa dạng. Nhân viên thân thiện, nhiệt tình. Khách sạn mới quay lại hoạt động nên phòng được sửa mới, thiết bị cũng mới.

review.rating: Great location, Friendly staff, Big breakfast, Clean and welcoming.
review.room_type: Suite Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Ban Công & Tầm Nhìn Ra Toàn Cảnh
review.comment_positive:
The hotel was so lovely, all the staff were so friendly, great rooms, big beds, clean, nice big pool and beds. You can also order food and drinks in your room and by the pool.
We did our laundry there, super easy and quick.
Breakfast had good options.
Great location, quick walk to the old town, easy to get taxis/grabs or the hotel can organise for you.
Also when we arrived, a staff member sat down with us and went through what there is to do and see. super helpful!

review.room_type: Phòng Premium Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Ban Công & Tầm Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive:
Fantastic location.. quiet area but only about 10min walk to the ancient town. 
Beautiful hotel with amazing staff... everyone was really helpful. I don't eat pork - they went out of their way during breakfast to prepare alternative food. 
My cousin mentioned that she really liked the cookies in the room and guess what, they gave us a whole box of cookies upon  checkout! Thank you Nga and Thao!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 3 Người/Gia Đình
Phòng Premium Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Ban Công & Tầm Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive:
I recently had the pleasure of staying at La Charm Hotel in Hoi An, Vietnam, and it was an absolute delight from start to finish. During my three-night stay, I experienced nothing short of exceptional hospitality and service.

First and foremost, the staff at La Charm Hotel are truly outstanding. From the moment I arrived, I was greeted with warm smiles and genuine care. They went above and beyond to ensure that my stay was comfortable and memorable. Their attention to detail and willingness to assist with any request truly set them apart.

The accommodations at La Charm Hotel were superb. My room was spacious, impeccably clean, and beautifully decorated, providing the perfect retreat after a day of exploring Hoi An. The amenities were top-notch, and I especially enjoyed relaxing by the pool, which offered a tranquil oasis in the heart of the city.

In addition to the fantastic amenities, the staff at La Charm Hotel also helped me arrange some unforgettable experiences during my stay. They assisted me in booking a scooter tour, allowing me to explore the stunning countryside surrounding Hoi An with ease. They also organized a cooking class, where I had the opportunity to learn traditional Vietnamese recipes from skilled chefs.

Overall, my experience at La Charm Hotel was nothing short of exceptional. From the luxurious accommodations to the outstanding service and unforgettable experiences, every aspect of my stay exceeded my expectations. I cannot recommend this hotel highly enough to anyone visiting Hoi An. It truly is a hidden gem that deserves to be discovered and celebrated.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 3 Người/Gia Đình

review.rating: Perfect stay at this lovely hotel .
review.room_type: Phòng Premium Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Ban Công & Tầm Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive:
It was in a great location just on the edge of the main area,and 1 block away from the river. Everywhere was walkable.

The staff were so friendly and service was impeccable- they could not do enough for their guests. 

Room was spacious with a balcony, bed was large and comfortable and the bathroom was quite luxurious. Elevators were quick (we were on the top floor). The pool was nice and long making it easy to go good lengths of swimming. Sun beds were comfortable and towels were provided.

Breakfast had a good choice of Asian and European and staff were quick in clearing tables and topping up the buffet. 

We had a really nice stay here. Lovely property, and friendly staff who enjoyed chatting to guests was just perfect for me.
review.comment_negative: My other half would have liked a full length mirror in the room, but that’s the only negative if you can it that.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: We had a fantastic stay at La Charm Hotel The staff were so helpful and always went out of their way to help, providing great recommendations for local resturants, tours, and tailors. The room was lovely, really clean and big. The facilities including the pool, spa and bikes make it a great place to stay! Great location near the old town. Would highly recommend!.

The hotel is newly opened and has a fabulous pool area, with access to food and drinks here also. There is a great breakfast spread each morning also. They prepared my bed with a happy birthday welcome written with leaves a flowers. My name and a cake was on my bed! they sang the happy birthday to me! What a magical moment! Thanks guys! those are an ever lasting memories! Much appreciated!

Location is just out of the old town (about 5 minutes walk) and there are free bicycles to use and many laundry services nearby. Reception also helped us book the Bamboo Circus show which was amazing! Overall a great stay

review.comment_positive: Amazing hotel and room! We used the laundry service while we stayed and it was so cheap and the clothes smelt delicious afterwards. They even gave us two free boxes of cookies as we checked out (these have been a life saver throughout the rest of our trip).

review.rating: Super Hotel, sehr freundliches Personal. Das Hotel ist sehr zu empfehlen!
review.room_type: Phòng Premium Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Ban Công & Tầm Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive:
Das Hotel ist sehr schön und in einer guten Lage in Hoi An (zweite Reihe zum Fluss).
Der Night Markt, der Fluss, Old town und alle anderen Sehenswürdigkeiten von Hoi An sind gut zu Fuss oder auch mit dem Fahrrad (kostenlos vom Hotel und in guten Zustand, im Vergleich zu anderen Hotels) erreichbar.

Das Frühstücksbüffet ist gut. Für uns persönlich war die Auswahl von vietnamesischen Speisen zu gering (vieles hatte Western Style). Was aber nicht negativ zu betrachten ist.

Wir hatten ein schönes und ruhiges Zimmer auf höchster Ebene (7. Stock).
Das Badezimmer ist gut und geräumig.
Das Schlafzimmer ist grundsätzlich auch geräumig. Da wir ein Kingsize Bett wollten, wurden uns zwei große Betten nebeneinander gestellt, was toll war, den Platz im Zimmer jedoch etwas einschränkte. Was aber für unsere drei Nächte auch nicht weiter schlimm war und wir wollten diese Bettgrösse selbst.
Was etwas störend war, war die Lautstärke der Klimaanlage. Ab und an hat die Klimaanlage sehr laute Geräusche gemacht. Da wir beide nachts sehr tief schlafen, haben wir dem Personal nichts davon gesagt. Erst als wir beim auschecken gefragt wurden. Das Personal hat sich sehr dafür entschuldigt und wollte uns dafür 200.000 VDN als Entschädigung geben. Dies haben wir aber nicht angenommen und gebeten, dem Hotelpersonal zukommen zu lassen.

Das Personal im gesamten Hotel ist sehr sehr freundlich.
Besonders Ms. Uyen an der Rezeption ist sehr freundlich. Schon bei der Anreise hat sie uns mit den wichtigsten Informationen versorgt. Über sie haben wir auch zwei Ausflüge gebucht ( einmal Memories Land und coconut boot) alles verlief unkompliziert und gut organisiert

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: To start from the check in they make you feel so good, the attention is amazing, the hotel is very nice very well decorated, the room was super clean, lots of options in the breakfast, fantastic pool, and they give great information about tours and shows. Well located

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: Customer service was excellent. Staff was very attentive and friendly. Rooms we're spacious, clean and wwll equipt. Breakfast was good. Location is good. Not too close to the main center which means not to noisy at night but close enough to walk.
review.comment_negative: Some guest on our floor we're really noisy. They kept talling across from each others room door early morning and night. So echo in halls made it really loud.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: El trato de personal fue increible, siempre atentos a tu bienestar. El servicio del restaurant tambien fue muy bueno, me trajeron la comida que les pedi, ya que me sentia mal del estomago  y todos los dias preguntaban por mi recuperacion. El desayuno tambien muy rico y variado. La pileta muy linda y la habitacion tambien.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 3 Người/Gia Đình
review.comment_positive: Good location and good breakfast. Staff were very friendly and helpful especially Loan.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive:
Staff very attentive and helpful.
Rooms were of a very high standard and kept spotlessly clean. Breakfast was comprehensive and high quality. The pool area is very nice and the staff are always on hand for drinks and snacks. The hotel will organise trips and transfers which can be added to your bill. Great location on edge of old town so easy walk in but still quiet

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ

review.rating: Great location, free bikes were amazing!
review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Thời Thượng Có Ban Công & Tầm Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive: Great location, pool, friendly staff with good recommendations and free bikes!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: I recently had a fantastic experience staying at La Charm Hotel, the hotel was right at the Hoi An Old Quarter made me extremely convenient for exploring the centre, cultures and activities. I am also very pleased with the friendly and accommodating staff here, and the hotel's beautiful new facilities and very chill garden provided a serene and 100% relaxing atmosphere. It was so enjoyable when reading the books under the sunshine :) Overall, I highly recommend La Charm Hoi An for anyone looking for a comfortable and enjoyable stay in Hoi An and who wants to experience a delightful but still experience the real vibe of this beautiful city.
review.comment_negative: I hope the chilling area will be completed with full equipment soon!

review.rating: The perfect spot for an enjoyable stay in beautiful Hoi An
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive:
The  best hotel I’ve been in Asia! Everything was just perfect: The hotel is new, the room was tastefully furnished, large enough for two people, there was also a desk, chair, a small sofa and three night-stands. The bed was very comfortable and we slept well, as the street is sufficiently quiet. 
The pool in the garden is large, there are sunbeds and towels available. The small gym is well equipped. 
Ms Nga at the reception desk was extremely kind and helpful, she gave us tips where to do shopping and even booked several train-tickets for our further travels for us. 
The breakfast is plentiful, versatile and delicious! 
Five minutes walk to the busy old-town, moreover, bikes can be borrowed for free (20-min. ride to A Bang-beach). 
The staff are very kind, efficient and highly professional. 
We felt so comfortable and well cared for that we even prolonged our stay!

review.rating: 良い立地、良いサービス

review.comment_positive: Breakfast was lovely, location excellent, the staff were amazing - so friendly and helpful.  Highly recommend this to anyone travelling to Hoi An - was our third time in Hoi An and this lovely place was the best

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: Great staff, explained really well what to see, what to do, etc., right on arrival. The hotel is perfectly located just a few minutes walk to all the busy touristy parts, yet the hotel itself is in a quiet area. The free bikes are ok (as compared to falling apart in other hotels we stayed at), though note that they are all pretty small, which makes it difficult if you are tall. Breakfast was superb, the best out of all other hotels we stayed at during our 2 weeks in Vietnam.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive:
- Early Check-In + Gratis Frühstück am ersten Tag
- Sehr gutes und umfangreiches Frühstücksbuffet
- Hilfsbereites Personal (Tipps für Ausflüge usw.)
- Großes Zimmer
- Nette Poolanlage
- Sehr gute Lage

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình
review.comment_positive: Khách sạn nhìn chung cũng được. Giá cả phù hợp với những gì chúng tôi nhận được.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Thời Thượng Có Ban Công & Tầm Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive: 房間乾淨

review.room_type: Suite Thông Nhau Qua Cửa Nối
Phòng Premium Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Ban Công & Tầm Nhìn Ra Sông

review.rating: Charming La Charm hotel Hoi An
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: The staff and customer service was what stood out at this hotel. Excellent front desk staff who went above and beyond especially as I was ill one day. They brought me water, ginger tea and checked on me. Ms Nga was a stand out - organising a private driver for me too. Breakfast was also lovely with lots of choice.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ

review.rating: It is a gem not to be missed.
review.room_type: Suite Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Ban Công & Tầm Nhìn Ra Toàn Cảnh
review.comment_positive: Nice location, 8 minute walk into old town Hoi An. This hotel reopened (after COVID) 2 months before we stayed-and staffing was excellent, very helpful, and the decor with the coloured tiles and lanterns are nostalgic and romantic.  The breakfast very good, a variety of choices and everything was super clean.  The outdoor swimming pool was of a very good size, in terms of its length. Nice cooling after a day out!  Best of all, relatively inexpensive, therefore great value for money.  However I would guess as the tourism industry recovers more, prices may go up.  I think Hoi An has lots to offer and we stayed here 4 nights and enjoyed every moment.  We booked a private guide ahead of time but if you like more freedom you can book day trips at the hotel as needed, for flexibility. We also used the spa for massages and your USD goes a long way!
review.comment_negative: Nothing really to complain about.  I think underrated place.  But I like it as it is a smaller town and not so commercialized.  E.g. No McDonalds in town! Excellent!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive:
Gia đình mình đi chơi từ bắc vào nam. Và đây là hotel nhà mình ưng ý và hài lòng nhất. 
 Vị trí gần phố cổ, chỗ nghỉ có xe đạp cho khách mượn để dạo quanh phố cổ. Các bạn nhân viên và lễ tân vô cùng nhiệt tình. Phòng sạch sẽ, đồ ăn sáng ngon đa dạng. Bể bơi sạch. Chỗ đậu xe rộng rãi. Các bạn còn rất tinh tế, tặng quà khi về nữa.
Rất recommend mọi người ở đây. Sau có dịp nhất định mình sẽ quay lại.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: The hotel is so clean and cozy. The bed was the most comfortable one we have slept on. The staff were so friendly and helpful. Overall, I love every minute I stayed there. Definitely will be back!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: Wonderful hotel. The room was great with a very comfortable bed. The buffet breakfast has many tasty options and the pool area was great for relaxing and swimming in the afternoon. The location is perfect for exploring the area.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 3 Người/Gia Đình
review.comment_positive:
Great, peaceful location, but a very short walk to the river and main street.
Staff were wonderful and very helpful with booking trips and activities.

review.rating: スタッフのおもてなしが素晴らしい
review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Thời Thượng Có Ban Công & Tầm Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive:
スタッフの方の対応が素晴らしいです。
アーリーチェックアウトだったのでフルーツと温かいドリンクのランチBOXを
用意してくださり心のこもったサービスが心地良かったです。
お部屋のインテリアが素敵でホイアンの雰囲気に合っていました。
review.comment_negative: 周囲の建物が工事中で眺望が残念でした。プールサイドで粉塵まみれになりました。

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive:
Desde el momento que entras te das cuenta que estas en un hotel que en España ya sería considerado como de lujo muy alto.
El trato de todo el personal es abrumador, desde Nga, pero incluyendo a todos los que alli estaban, y eran muchos. No falta ni un detalle.
La habitacion muy espaciosa con una cama tremendamente grande al igual que la ducha y baño, y temperatura ideal.
Aun asi lo mejor es cuando pruebas el desayuno del hotel, podría contar como comida/cena de buffet completo porque tiene de todo y reponiendo constantemente por todo el personal muy atento.
Muchas recomendaciones, servicios extras, gimasio y una piscina muy relajante amena para los dias calurosos.
Cuando vuelva repetiré hotel sin duda.
review.comment_negative: Imposible poner un solo pero a nuestra estancia

review.room_type: Suite Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Ban Công & Tầm Nhìn Ra Toàn Cảnh
Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive:
This hotel had everything one would expect and more from a 4/5-star rating. Its outstanding features were an excellent breakfast that included western and Asian selections, and the very friendly and attentive service we received from all of the staff. Also, the facilities cater well for people of all ages including children.
I would not hesitate to stay there again and recommend it to others.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ

review.rating: A comfy hotel and the staff are super helpful
review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Thời Thượng Có Ban Công & Tầm Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive: Great room, excellent bed, nice pool and very close to the centre of Hoi An

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: This is so far the best hotel I’ve ever stayed in SEA. From the moment we check in until check out. The service is superb. My husband was sick when we got there, Ms. Thao offered him a ginger drink to made him feel better.  The room is really big and the bed is huge. Nice bathroom with shower and bath tub. Also helped us book a day tour to Hue with an amazing and knowledgeable tour guide. I will stay in La Charm again if ever come back to HoiAn.

review.room_type: Phòng Premium Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Ban Công & Tầm Nhìn Ra Sông
Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: Everything was great

review.rating: With a great location, all the service and comfort you need, pretty reasonable breakfast, and great value, I hope to be
review.room_type: Phòng Premium Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Ban Công & Tầm Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive: Very friendly staff especially Ms Nga who helped us with bookings and is delightfully energetic and welcoming. Great location with 5 minute walk to the old town around the river, nice room, and pretty good swimming pool. And service was excellent.
review.comment_negative: Bit busy with breakfast and coach tours but after 8am the hotel was perfect

review.rating: Highly Recommend! We'll be back for sure!
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 3 Người/Gia Đình
review.comment_positive:
Highly recommend this hotel! Staff were very hospitable, they made sure we had the best experience at Hoi An. Shout out to Loan who took care of us during our stay :)

Location is great as it's just outside the old town. 

Bed was the most comfortable compared to all the other hotels we've booked in Vietnam. 

Lastly, amenities were top notch - complete with spa, gym & pool. Spa is perfect for when you wanna have a massage after all the walking!
review.comment_negative: Breakfast had a good selection but would be nice to add more local dishes to try.

review.rating: I wouldnt have wanted to stay anywhere else
review.room_type: Suite Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Ban Công & Tầm Nhìn Ra Toàn Cảnh
review.comment_positive: Loved it. First trip to Vietnam which was a great start

review.rating: Charming Stay at La Charm Hotel Hoi An
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive:
The hotel is charming. The deepest impression was that literally all the staff made an effort to make the guest feels welcome. The staff are friendly and helpful.
Location: It is at a good quiet neighbourhood a short walk to old town and the japanese bridge (the japanese bridge is under total renovation right now - look to me it was knocked down and rebuilt with new technology. Will they preserve history or let history be history?)
Hotel Room: big, comfortable, bed is super big. Enough space to put luggage and not get in the way. room as a balcony. Water is hot enough, shower water pressure is strong enough to have a good refreshing shower.
Breakfast: This one is nice with many choices. I enjoyed leisurely breakfasts.
Facilities: The swimming pool not too big but cozy. the garden has some good spots for photos. A decent gym but few guest use them.
review.comment_negative:
Nothing I could think of. 
If I really must, I usually turn on TV looking for Channel News Asia (CNA) which this hotel did not subscribe to. No big deal anyway.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive:
Really great staff - very friendly and helpful with advice about navigating Hoi An and recommendations to make the most out of the trip.  The facilities was very good; any feedback was quickly followed up on. The room and amenities inside were excellent and spacious; the balcony was great, even if we could not use it due to the weather. 
The included breakfast was fantastic; the options and quality exceeded our expectations.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: Comfortable, beautiful and lovely, helpful staff. Their recommendations were good and breakfast was a feast.
review.comment_negative: If you use the spa, the quality depends on who you get (though, when doesn't it!) so perhaps ask for someone experienced. The staff were lovely when we mentioned it and rushed to rectify.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Thời Thượng Có Ban Công & Tầm Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive: The staff, the hotel and all the facilities and explanations they gave us! Free bicycles at reception was the best to move around the city.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
Phòng Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Thời Thượng Có Ban Công & Tầm Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive:
From the moment I walked through the door, nothing was too much trouble. Ms Nga was attentive without being pushy, gave me great advice on attractions, what to do and see, and most importantly which tailor to visit 
The room was beautiful, air conditioned, and comfortable, the shower was incredible and refreshing after long hot days.
The breakfast spread, included in the price, was incredible...local food, pastries, fruit, freshly cooked on request and a range of juices and coffee.
All the staff were friendly and welcoming at all times of day and as a solo traveller I was safe and looked after
review.comment_negative: The trip was way too short ha ha

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 3 Người/Gia Đình
Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: Everything was great - location (very near the old town), amenities, food, spa, staff (Mrs Loan and Mrs Nga in particular!), day trip to Hue that they organised...all amazing

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: 櫃檯親切 住宿地點方便

review.rating: big and clean room. great location. great atmosphere.  great service.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: big and clean room. great location. great atmosphere.  great service.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive:
El hotel La Charm es un magnífico lugar para pasar unos días en Hoi An. Esta muy bien ubicado, a pocos minutos caminando del centro. Las instalaciones son elegantes y bonitas y la habitación amplia y cómoda. El personal está muy pendiente de ti y de tu comodidad, desde el hotel puedes contratar muchísimas excursiones lo que te facilita el viaje y te quita de estafas. 
Es un hotel maravillo que recomiendo a cualquiera que quiera descansar y relajarse

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 3 Người/Gia Đình

review.rating: 직원들이 친절해서 더 기억에 남는 호텔
review.room_type: Suite Thông Nhau Qua Cửa Nối
review.comment_positive:
직원분들이 매운 친절했다
한명이 친절한게 아니라
대부분 직원들이 친절하고
조금이라도 도움을 주고 싶어 미소로 말을 걸었다

특히 Ms. NGA는
우리가 바나힐로 이동과 
바나힐에서 다낭 호텔까지 이동을 도와주었고 
그 비용도 그랩 보다
휠씬 좋은 금액을 제안 해주었다
혹시 무슨 문제가 생기면 호텔이 도와주겠다고 해서
더욱 신뢰가 갔다

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: The facilities and staff were exceptional. The rooms are spacious and very clean.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive:
Très bel établissement. 
À deux pas du centre d’Hoi an, possibilité d’utiliser des vélos gratuitement. 
chambre spacieuse et propre. 
Le personnel est très accueillant et au petit soin pour nous. 
Petit déjeuner très très varié et très bon. 
Nous reviendrons!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: Overall excellent experience

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive:
Everything about the hotel is perfect, the staff is extremely friendly, everyone that we met tried their best to help us. At the beginning they explained us Everything that we should know about the city on the map, they gave us tips about touristic things. The room is big, clean, the pool is bigger than it seems on the photos, the location is great, very close to old town, you can use bicycles for free to see around. They have an aggrement with a nice beach clup at the most famous beach so you can use it free too. The spa is also professional. The breakfast is more than enough. They have a nice restaurant too. They can arrange you pickup from airport for a reasonable price. At the end they gave me a gift which was very polite. 
I would definitely stay here again

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 3 Người/Gia Đình

review.rating: Staff are very friendly and efficient. We feel comfortable and very much enjoy our stay.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: overall breakfast was good. There're many varieties to choose from including fresh fruits. I especially liked the pineapple and passionfruit. But we missed the crunchy but supper soft inside baguettes that we had from Halina Hotel in Da Nang.
review.comment_negative: Bathroom door a bit noisy when open and closed.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: Absolument exceptionnel, le personnel d'une gentillesse inouïe, l'accueil, le service, la propreté, enfin bref, je donne un 10/10

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 3 Người/Gia Đình
review.comment_positive: The staff were excellent. The breakfast was great!

review.rating: Very friendly staff nothing was too much trouble would love to return
review.room_type: Phòng Premium Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Ban Công & Tầm Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive: Very central location clean rooms

review.rating: Nice swimming pool but there are flies one the food.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: I like the indoor spaces, wide and well decorated, well done!! The rooms were fine and the view from our bedroom was nice, also the terrace was European style. Good choices for breakfast and nice swimming pool area. Also the guy who welcome you at the entrance is super nice!!
review.comment_negative:
Well... I have a couple of suggestions:
1) at breakfast, cover the food. It is a hot place and there are flies. It has been underwhelming seeing the disregard of the staff for flies going on food. I know local people are used to worse and English people probably don't care, but it is still unacceptable. I can't give more than 3 stars just for this one.
2) Bathrooms were fine, probably high standard for non-European people. However, it was missing both the anti-slip mat inside the shower and the mat out of the shower, basic things in the bathroom. Also, the shower itself was leaking water out of the shower area.
In regards to another thing we did not like, I can say we both felt squeezed in the swimming pool area, as it is obvious they built it around existing buildings. Also, the view of a skyscraper skeleton from one side and a poor house right next to the swimming pool is not great.

review.room_type: Suite Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Ban Công & Tầm Nhìn Ra Toàn Cảnh
review.comment_positive: The staff were very friendly and helpful. If there was a problem they fixed it. The hotel was in walking distance to the awesome night markets and the lanterns. I loved the sunbeds by the pool.

review.rating: Hôtel à recommander à Hoi an.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: La gentillesse et la serviabilité du personnel. Le petit déjeuner est délicieux. Il y en a pour tous les goûts. La douche et facilement réglable à toutes les températures. Le lit est grand et confortable. Le rapport qualité prix est excellent.
review.comment_negative: La vue de la chambre n'était pas exceptionnelle, mais si on veut être près du centre ville on ne peut pas exiger une vue mer ou campagne 😀

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive:
L’hôtel est vraiment très agréable et bien placé , le personnel est très attentionné , j’ai utilisé le service spa , très satisfaite. Petit déjeuner buffet très varié , belle piscine 
Le grand plus est que je suis tombée malade , je voyage seule et le staff a été aux petits soins pour moi , a appelé un médecin, préparé de la soupe de riz , du thé au gingembre , ils ont été exceptionnels et je les remercie de tout cœur 
J’oubliais ils m’ont préparé également un gâteau d’anniversaire 
Je recommande fortement cet hôtel et son personnel si attentionné

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 3 Người/Gia Đình
Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ

review.rating: Friendly staff, great breakfast and an excellent value.  High recommend
review.room_type: Phòng Premium Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Ban Công & Tầm Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive: Welcoming and helpful staff.  Excellent breakfast

review.rating: La Charm - the place to come and feel the charm of Hoi An
review.room_type: Suite Thông Nhau Qua Cửa Nối
review.comment_positive: La Charm was a cozy intimate hotel we stayed at for 2 nights. The rooms were immaculate, the staff wonderful and the atmosphere sublime. The pool was gorgeous and the swinging day beds a wonderful way to relax after a day strolling through Old town Hoi An
review.comment_negative: There wasn't anything we did not like about the hotel.

review.room_type: Phòng Premium Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Ban Công & Tầm Nhìn Ra Sông
Suite Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Ban Công & Tầm Nhìn Ra Toàn Cảnh
review.comment_positive: Staff, location, room, swimming pool, breakfast

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: Hotel looks very nice,rooms are clean ,bed is huge and confortable, and staff is very kind, helpfull and proffesional.Breakfast was good also with a lot of choises.We had a very pleasant stay here.I strongly recommand!

review.room_type: Suite Thông Nhau Qua Cửa Nối
review.comment_positive: The staff were so lovely, considerate and helpful, especially Ms Thao
review.comment_negative: The corridors echoed slightly, but it wasn’t a big problem

review.rating: Great location very friendly staff. Free bikes and onky 3-4 minute cycle to old town.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: Very clean great location!

review.rating: A must stay in Hoi An
review.room_type: Suite Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Ban Công & Tầm Nhìn Ra Toàn Cảnh
review.comment_positive: We loved everything during our stay and were treated like royalty. Small touches were provided through out and all staff were great. e.g knowing your name, asking of your day, providing a special leaving gift. We wish we could stay here longer. Breakfast buffet is incredible, best we have come across in Vietnam. We used the spa and pool which was also a lovely treat in the hot weather. Immaculate and only 3-5 minute walk to the old town Hoi An. Will definitely be returning and recommending to others who visit this brilliant country.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: Las instalaciones, la ubicación muy buena y las recomendaciones del staff

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 3 Người/Gia Đình
review.comment_positive: 美味早餐 优良服务 位置优越

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: Our 2 nights stay was absolutely perfect. The room was spacious and clean, buffet breakfast was varied, service was outstanding and attentive, free bikes included. Pool area was cosy and relaxing, spa was simple and relaxing. Laundry was affordable too. Location is 5 mins walk to start of Old town or a couple of mins on bike. Extremely good value for money!
review.comment_negative: The spa area could be refurbished and provide more privacy.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: Wonderful hotel with friendly, helpful staff, a delicious breakfast buffet, great location, free quality bicycles to ride.

review.rating: Høy kvalitet til en veldig bra pris
review.room_type: Suite Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Ban Công & Tầm Nhìn Ra Toàn Cảnh
review.comment_positive: Stort utvalg i frokosten. Masse personale tilstede som venter på å hjelpe deg. Fin beliggenhet nær sentrum og elven. Flotte rom, med komfortable senger.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: Great location for a visit to Hoi An! Nice gym and good quality breakfast! Got a little present when ckecking out which was cool!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: Tout ! La chambre très spacieuse, la gentillesse du personnel, la piscine, le spa, les équipements de la chambre … tout était parfait. Même avant notre arrivée la communication avec Mme Nga a vraiment apporté un plus, elle nous a aidé à organiser notre trajet pour parvenir à Hoi an et le tarif était très raisonnable. Nous sommes passés par l’hôtel pour participer à un cours de cuisine et balade en bateau panier c’était super !

They were also very patient in answering our questions on places to visit and helping with trip and transport reservations.

review.rating: Extremely comfortable stay in a lovely hotel
review.room_type: Suite Thông Nhau Qua Cửa Nối
review.comment_positive: The breakfast was amazing, so many choices and everything was fresh. The staff were incredibly kind and helpful, the rooms were spacious and the bed was amazing. I felt to safe happy and relaxed at La Charm and would stay again if visiting Hoi An. A special mention to Ms Nga and Ms Uyan who were super helpful. We booked tours etc  ( coffee making, lantern making, cooking class) through the hotel which was fantastic as well. They made it really easy to book these adventures and we were picked up from the hotel. The spa was also truly lovely, very clean and professional and the treatments we had were just devine. Didn't get a chance to swim in the pool but the pool area looked nice. I would totally recommend La Charm as a comfortable place to stay in Hoi An
review.comment_negative: I can't think of any improvements needed

But it’s the lovely staff that makes the rating above 10+ worth. Such a lovely team of sweet ladies who are so helpful. I will definitely come back. I would even include Hoi An again just because of enjoying staying here.

review.comment_negative: Die Unterkunft war sehr gut gelegen und das Personal sehr freundlich. Das Frühstück war eher für den asiatischen Geschmack ausgelegt. Dafür gab es viel Auswahl. Insgesamt haben wir deutlich bessere Frühstücke auf unserer Reise gehabt. Was jedoch den Aufenthalt trübte, war, dass man vor Abreise vom Personal gedrängt wurde eine gute Bewertung zu hinterlassen. Man wurde sogar emotional erpresst, dass ansonsten eine Kündigung folgen könnte. Eine 8 entspricht aber unserer neutralen Wertung.

review.rating: Enjoyable time! Don't believe? Try to stay there!
review.room_type: Suite Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Ban Công & Tầm Nhìn Ra Toàn Cảnh
review.comment_positive: Location, decoration, staff, services! We were the first group to book a food tour in Hoi An! It was wonderful expriences in trying the local authentic foods made by local people that I think only local people know these places (streetby foods)! Really tasty and special, different from the restaurants! I think you should book this tour if visiting Hoi An.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 3 Người/Gia Đình
Phòng Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Thời Thượng Có Ban Công & Tầm Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive:
Well this hotel definitely lives up to it name! The staff were beyond helpful  without being intrusive , every query was met with earnest and helpful assistance . honestly sad to leave , whether it was finding a table for breakfast or looking for advice on local tours I was always looked after with a genuine helpfulness and a friendly attitude .
When I was told this hotel had only reopened less than a month ago I was shocked because what I found here was a well oiled machine . many thanks to Ms. Nga and Lucky in particular .

For location you couldn’t find a better , a stones throw from the famous night market but in a location away from the noise . 
the amenities where excellent , the pool and spa in particular . I made particular use of the hotels bicycles which are free to use as this is a cycle friendly place . 

The room and standards of cleaning were excellent , room service was fast and efficient and the food restaurant quality , I found myself quickly wanting to try everything on the menu . 

I will be recommending this location to any and all who wish to spend time in Hoi An .

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive:
got nicely greeted by smiling staff upon arrival
we were pleased to get a room upgrade.
staff helped us book a trip to Ba Na Hills and a taxi to the airport.
The staff treated us like old friends, so adding to our holiday experience and nothing seemed too much triuble
breakfast buffet was very nice and tasty with plenty of choice available

review.rating: Loved our stay! Would definitely recommend.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive:
We loved our stay! The hotel was really clean and our room was very comfortable. 
It was in a great location - just a short walk along the river to the old town.
There was a lot of choice at breakfast, and we loved sitting in the garden. Hieu at breakfast was so kind in setting us up a table so we could eat outside every day - we loved it!
We had a spa treatment which was also super lovely - thanks so much to the staff there.
We had a lovely swim in the pool, and liked that we could pick up a towel beside the pool.
Free bike hire was also a great addition!

The staff were all super lovely. The receptionist gave us a great overview of the town and what to do. We were so impressed by how attentive every staff member was, and they were all so friendly. 

Thanks so much for the fab stay!
review.comment_negative: Nothing! We loved it all and would definitely recommend.

review.rating: My favourite hotel in Hoi An
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: Last year I stayed at La Charm for the first time and was very satisfied with my stay there. So, when I returned to Hoi An this spring La Charm was my obvious choice. I think the location is just perfect as it is situated close to the river in a quiet area with little traffic, and the centre of Hoi An is only a nice 10-minute walk along the river. Even when you compare La Charm to 5-star hotels in Hoi An, La Charm comes out very favourable, and in my option none of those has such a nice location. The rooms are spacious and nicely laid out, with a very comfortable big bed. Breakfast is delicious and have many variants. I recommend borrowing one of the hotel free bikes and explore the countryside to see some of the surroundings. Of all of La Charm’s assets the staff is the biggest one. All are super friendly, and they care for you and remember you when you return which you will! The quality/price ratio of La Charm is unbeatable, and I am already planning my next stay there.

review.rating: Brilliant location, facilities, service and overall impression.

review.rating: A hidden gem in Hoi An. Must visit!
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive:
My stay at La Charm Hoi An Hotel & Spa was fantastic! The staff were incredibly welcoming, and the free room upgrade was a pleasant surprise. The room was spacious and elegant, providing a comfortable retreat. The laundry service was efficient, and the airport transfer was smooth, adding to the convenience of my stay.
The pool was a highlight, offering a relaxing escape after a day of exploring. Room service was efficient and the food delicious. Proximity to old town Hoi A was fantastic. Overall, I highly recommend La Charm for a memorable stay in Hoi An.

Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive:
We stayed at La Charm Hotel on our Wedding Anniversary Day... They gave us a beautiful surprise by decorating our room...
Room was really spacious and comfortable with all necessary requirements...
Bathroom was huge with bath tub and shower in it and most importantly very clean...
Breakfast buffet had so many good options to eat... I am Vegan so staff helped me with a vegan fried noodles cooked specially for me...
They have good tour options and also helped us book a good car to Airport.
It is located very near to Ancient town and night market... They provide bicycle for commute.
On Checkout, staff greeted us with so much warmth and love; gifted us with two boxes of coconut cookies as a souvenir...
We just spent a night here but I will always remember our staff at La Charm Hotels...
Highly recommended Guys...
Must stay here for amazing experience as they have reasonably good spa options too.
Keep up the good work La Charm Hotels team and best wishes...

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: 다양하고 맛있는 조식, 깨끗한 물과 청결한 시설, 매우 큰 침대, 아이가 탈 수 있는 자전거 무료 대여로 호이안 올드타운 투어 가능, 친절한 직원, 자세한 관광지와 맛집 설명, 와이파이 속도가 높아서 일하기 수월했음, 객실 크기도 크고 테라스가 있었으며 전망도 좋았음, 저렴한 가격에 높은 퀄리티 등 좋았던 점이 매우 많았습니다.
review.comment_negative: 호텔 자체의 구조적인 문제로 방음이 잘 안 되며, 올드타운 뷰의 객실인 경우 새벽 3시부터 인근 민가에서 울어대는 닭의 울음 소리로 인해 숙면을 취하기가 어려움.

review.rating: A beautiful relaxing spot in Hoi An
review.room_type: Phòng Premium Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Ban Công & Tầm Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive: Everything. The staff and service they provide is exceptional. The rooms are beautiful with lovely views. The pool is a relaxing space to enjoy a hot afternoon. We booked a room for ourselves and a cheaper room for our son and they provided a free upgrade for his room. The beds are nice and soft!

review.rating: Phenomenal service and the best hotel in VN!
review.room_type: Suite Thông Nhau Qua Cửa Nối
review.comment_positive: The staff are amazing and the hotel room was extremely comfortable. The bed was soft as feathers, the ac cold like snow, and the shower was heavenly. I cannot recommend this hotel enough to fellow travelers. It’s your home away from home.
review.comment_negative: Nothing to complain about at this hotel. It was perfect!

review.room_type: Phòng Premium Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Ban Công & Tầm Nhìn Ra Sông
Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: Very close walking distance to Old Town, have bicycles to rent if you’d prefer biking instead of walking. The staff was all very friendly and attentive, the service was amazing and reception was very helpful in providing recommendations and booking tours. The biggest breakfast had a lot of options and a new variety each morning. 100% recommend this hotel.

review.rating: Outstanding hotel very close to old town
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive:
We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at La Charm Hotel. The hotel is exceptionally well kept, the staff are very friendly, and the facilities are excellent. This is the best place we’ve stayed in Vietnam.
Great location, a short 5 minute walk to the old town, or even faster using the free bikes offered by La Charm. 
We enjoyed the included breakfast every morning. The pool and loungers were also a great spot to relax.
The staff gave me a cake and set up our room specifically for my birthday. We didn’t tell them it was my birthday so this was an awesome surprise.
Finally, the hotel has a small gym with some basic weights, treadmills and spin bikes. You don’t find gyms often in Vietnam hotels so I enjoyed fitting a quick run in during our time here.
Overall, a great hotel and good value for money. We will be back if we return to Hoi An.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: El personal está comprometido con la excelencia y la mejora continua, es simpático, atento y volcado con la satisfacción del cliente. Bonita decoración y ubicación muy conveniente con todas las comodidades. Instalaciones bien mantenidas y buenos servicios de restauración y spa.
review.comment_negative: Quizá deba mejorarse la insonorización frente a ruidos de impacto en techos y forjados, pero es un detalle menor. También debería mejorarse la iluminación en baño que puede quedar algo corta.

review.rating: Relaxing, enjoyable time and very friendly staff.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: Breakfast  was  amazing. Food choices were very tasty and delicious.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: The Staff are very Friendly and Helpful. Location is very close to night market.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Thời Thượng Có Ban Công & Tầm Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive: Hôtel idéalement situé, proche des animations et restaurants néanmoins au calme. Personnel adorable, souriant, disponible. Vélos proposés gracieusement. Très bon hôtel

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: Das Personal war sehr hilfreich und hat uns tolle Tipps gegeben. Tolle Lage in unmittelbarer Nähe zur Altstadt.

review.rating: Stay here if you’re in Hoi An!!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive:
We absolutely loved la charm! It was one of the nicest hotels we stayed in in Vietnam. The staff and service were excellent. This hotel is extremely good value for the quality! The beds were soo comfortable, the rooms were pristine and the breakfast was delicious. The pool, spa and gym facilities were also 10/10. Nga did a great job of making us feel welcome as soon as we arrived and she gave us some great suggestions for how to spend our time in Hoi An. The hotel also arranged an early morning transfer to the airport for us and made us a packed breakfast. 

I booked this hotel because of the great reviews and I was not disappointed. I would recommend this hotel to anyone visiting Hoi An.

review.rating: Estancia ideal y buena relación calidad precio
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: Todo. Está super bien, bastante nuevo y comodo. Muy agradable sobretodo el personal.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: The staff were very friendly and kind. I’ve been travelling for 5 weeks and the lady in reception when I got in sat me down and asked what I wanted to do whilst in Hoi an and once responded recommended all the places she thinks are good value and organised the transport and showed me on a map where to go. I found this incredible and she really told the time out to help me. She was amazing and all the staff there. Very nice breakfast, pool and spa. First gym I have been to that’s amazing whilst on my travelling. Overall the stay was amazing and so relaxing, plus the bed and pillows were so comfy! Thanks a million x

review.room_type: Suite Thông Nhau Qua Cửa Nối
review.comment_positive:
The staff were very friendly and helpful Nga and her colleagues on reception were a great help and full of advice, Mr Hiện at breakfast every morning was so kind to our family, the entire staff and breakfast was so lovely too and helped entertain our baby. We had a massage from 2 therapists and Thuy and Ms Huey and there were absolutely brilliant. All staff were great, too many to mention! :) 

Breakfast was very varied and well laid out with lots of choice, if in Hoi An id definitely stay again

review.rating: A great place to stay in Hoi An
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: I can't say enough good things about La Charm - from the moment we got there we were treated so well - we arrived late and the kitchen accommodated us (we were hungry) and the front desk staff were so helpful - suggesting attractions, arranging for rides, etc. The spa and pool were welcome after a hot day of touring, and the breakfast buffet was world-class. A tip - be sure to get tickets to Memories of Hoi An - an evening show - we knew nothing about it until the helpful staff shared info and ensured we got tickets.
review.comment_negative: Nothing except I wish we had been able to stay longer.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 3 Người/Gia Đình
review.comment_positive: The hotel was super clean

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
Phòng Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Thời Thượng Có Ban Công & Tầm Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive: It was an excellent stay

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: Very beautiful hotel, clean and confortable room, nice, polite and helpful staff.

review.rating: Fabulous hotel near the old town, staff go above and beyond to make your stay wonderful
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: Excellent location near the old town, nice pool and spa facilities, staff take a lot of care to make sure your stay in Hoi An is great.

review.room_type: Suite Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Ban Công & Tầm Nhìn Ra Toàn Cảnh
review.comment_positive: Erittäin hyvää ja henkilökohtaista asiakaspalvelua. Viihtyisä allasosasto, kuntosali ja spa. Huone hyvin ilmastoitu ja viihtyisä. Saimme lisäksi erittäin hyvän näköalan. Majoituspaikasta lyhyt ja helppo matka vanhaan kaupunkiin. Mahdollisuus ilmaiseen polkupyörävuokraukseen! Henkilökunta toivoi palautetta oleskelusta ja kehittämisehdotuksia.
review.comment_negative: Aamupala oli runsas, mutta ei kovin maukas. Spassa pyyhkeitä ei pesty jokaisen käyttökerran jälkeen, vaan samaa jalkapyyhettä käytettiin seuraavalle asiakkaalle joka oli länsimaalaiselle uutta.

review.rating: 家族3人、朝食が付いてこのコストパフォーマンスは良いかと。プールもあるので暑いホイアン滞在には有り難い。
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 3 Người/Gia Đình
review.comment_positive:
スタッフの対応
朝食が毎日変わる
無料レンタルサイクルでどこでもスイスイ
帰り際のスカーフのプレゼント🎁
review.comment_negative:
チェックイン時のお掃除の不完全さ
棚のホコリ、バルコニーの髪の毛や砂
シャワーヘッドの不完全さ

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: Nous avons adoré cet hôtel pour tout. Accueil chaleureux tres propre calme tres bon emplacement. Excellent petit déjeuner. Nous reviendrons sans hésiter.

review.rating: Comfiest bed and the best staff!
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive:
The staff are exceptional. We felt very welcomed by their smiles. Everybody spoke very good English!
The comfort of the bed was incredible. We slept amazingly.
If/when we come back to Hoi An in the future. La Charm would be our first choice!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive:
this was probably the best hotel we stayed in during our trip! the location is great, quiet street just a quick walk to the old town. the staff was wonderful and took time to explain everything about the hotel and city as well as helped us out with transport and tours. the room had all amenities with a cute balcony and great view. Everything was super clean and taken care after, the room as well as the lobby and pool area- the hotel just reopened so everything is brand new.even
the breakfast buffet was great with many choices.book this hotel, you will not regret it!!

review.room_type: Suite Thông Nhau Qua Cửa Nối
review.comment_positive: Great breakfast and spacious room with a good sized bathroom. Had a massage at the onsite spa which was good, except the spa roof was leaking because of the heavy rain. The hotel arranged our transfer from Da Nang train station to the hotel which was very smooth.
review.comment_negative: Staff were very attentive but the check-in process was longer than we would have liked... we just wanted to get to the room without being told about every activity in the town.

review.room_type: Suite Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Ban Công & Tầm Nhìn Ra Toàn Cảnh
review.comment_positive: Everything staff were amazing

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ

review.rating: Topverblijf. Heerlijk hotel met geweldige medewerkers

review.comment_positive: De klantgerichtheid van de medewerkers en de staat van het hotel.
review.comment_negative: Niets. Enige minpunt zou kunnen zijn dat de medewerkers wel héél graag een review (10) willen ontvangen en niet schromen om dit 20 keer te vragen.

review.rating: Très bon séjour et très bon accueil,
review.room_type: Suite Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Ban Công & Tầm Nhìn Ra Toàn Cảnh
review.comment_positive: La possibilité d'emprunter des vélos, c'est vraiment un plus pour l'hôtel. Chambres très bien et propres avec des grands lits. Petit-déjeuner avec beaucoup de choix et plutôt bon. L'accueil et le personnel en général était très sympa et serviable pour nous aider avec nos valises ou les vélos. Petit thé d'accueil et de départ.
review.comment_negative: Les travaux nous ont réveillés les deux matins sans que l'hôtel nous ait prévenus qu'il y en aurait....

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: Very friendly staff, good location

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: Sehr freundliche Mitarbeiter, großartiges Frühstück, wunderschönes Zimmer, toller Pool

review.rating: Wonderful stay with exceptional staff in a beautiful hotel.

review.comment_positive: Staff were wonderful and friendly from the front of house, dining and housekeeping. Exceptional service.

review.room_type: Suite Thông Nhau Qua Cửa Nối

review.comment_positive: Staff were very service-oriented. Check-in process was very efficient and smooth despite the groups waiting. Bed and pillows were very comfortable. Location was just a short walk away from the hustle and bustle of the old quarters, great if you prefer somewhere more tranquil for a good night sleep. Breakfast selection was good too.
review.comment_negative: Steam food items could be kept hot to keep the texture right.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: Excellent location and staff very helpful and friendly

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: great value for money, nice and cozy bed, good position

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ

review.rating: Was very good service for the money.   A great value.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: It was centrally located close to River and Old town.   Staff was very helpful, and was a good value.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: 넓고 인테리어도 괜찮고 발코니까지 딸린 객실, 직원들 친절함, 맛사지 프로모션등 갓성비 호텔임.. 침구도 편안하고 침대도 넉넉하고 청소상태도 우수해요.
review.comment_negative: 조식이 좀 아쉬웠어요. 깔끔하고 먹을만 했지만 단백질 음식이 계란과 콩. 치즈가 다여서 그게 좀 아쉽.  육식좋아하는 사람들은  한접시로 끝내더라는.

reviewer.name: Gabriella
reviewer.country: United Arab Emirates (Các Tiểu Vương Quốc Ả Rập Thống Nhất)

review.comment_positive: This hotel is absolutely stunning. Great breakfast with many options. Amazing staff, lovely people. The design of the rooms wow, I loved the bathroom tap! Super clean. And the pool area super relaxing. I liked that we could take the bikes to the beach for free. Honestly, excellent service!

review.room_type: Phòng Premium Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Ban Công & Tầm Nhìn Ra Sông
Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: Khách sạn gần phố cổ, tiện cho khách đi dạo. Nhân viên thân thiện, nhiệt tình. Khách sạn và phòng rất sạch sẽ.

review.room_type: Suite Thông Nhau Qua Cửa Nối
Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: Breakfast is good spread of variety.  Location is 15 mins walk to old town.  Maintaince staff to service desk on choked wc was attended to immediately.  Front desk staff were very friendly and most speak good English.
review.comment_negative: Masseuse did not understand English.  Did not tell us to remove underwear for body scrub and ended up underwear was wet and soiled with scrub.   Fortunately, they gave us disposables on request. Otherwise, massage was satisfactory.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: Wspaniała obsługa hotelu, wszyscy bardzo pomocni, życzliwi i uśmiechnięci. Wszędzie czysto, dokładnie posprzątane. Smaczne śniadania, duży wybór potraw, świeżych owoców i różnych soków (szczególnie pyszny sok z arbuza). Zabiegi w SPA profesjonalnie wykonane, w miłej atmosferze. Na miejscu dostępne do wypożyczenia rowery utrzymane w naprawdę dobrym stanie, bez dodatkowych opłat. Przyjemny basen i możliwość leżenia przy basenie na łóżkach z baldachimem.

review.rating: Perfect location and hotel, so good!
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: Super mooi hotel en erg gastvrij! Iedereen wil je overal mee helpen en kan veel voor je regelen en boeken! Het ontbijt was echt heerlijk en uitgebreid en het zwembad was ook prachtig! Aanrader!!

review.rating: 早餐品質極佳 飯店設施整潔乾淨 有機會哈哈會再入住

review.comment_positive: We liked everything, especially the service.  All staff were very kind and cordial.  Great facilities and location. Wonderful breakfast and pool! We loved!!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: Very good breakfast provided by the hotel. very friendly staff and good location too.

review.rating: Very happy there, all staff were extremely welcoming and helpful. Would happily stay there again.

Nice refreshing pool area.
Best massage I’ve ever had!
review.comment_negative: My only gripe would be lack of TV entertainment, access to Netflix or YouTube would be great.

review.comment_positive: Altstadt von Hoi An zu Fuß schnell zu erreichen. Wir wurden sehr freundlich empfangen. Wir haben eine Massage gebucht, die war sehr gut. Bett ist sehr gemütlich.
review.comment_negative: Es hat relativ lange gedauert, bis man im Restaurant die Getränke bekommen hat.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: I can only agree with the previous speakers (with the good reviews). Everything is exactly as described. We enjoyed our stay and even extended it.

review.comment_positive: Very clean, there’s much light in the room, the balcony and the view is wonderful. The old city is in a walking distance. The breakfast was perfect! Highly recommended :)

review.rating: Loved the hotel really great service
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: Clean, modern , location, staff were lovely

Hot water go hot then cold when in the shower.
May be add a coffee shop in the restaurant area, so you can get drinks all day and night.

review.comment_positive: Mình hơi do dự khi đặt vì muốn đặt resort rộng hơn. Nhưng khi ở thì rất hài lòng. Rất gần phố cổ, phòng rộng, view đẹp, bể bơi đẹp sạch, nhân viên thân thiện. Nói chung là rất hài lòng.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: Good location. Close to everything.  Biggest bed I have ever seen. 😊The staff was amazing. Very welcoming. I traveled alone but didn’t feel alone, they were very attentive from beginning until the last minute of my stayed.  Would stay again.  I found Vietnamese people to be very friendly.  Awesome stay ❤️😊

review.comment_negative: A group of very ugly buildings under construction completely block the view and spoil the stay.  It borders the swimming pool.  It's a real nightmare.  Breakfast is mediocre.  Fried eggs are prepared in advance and served cold.

review.comment_positive:

review.room_type: Phòng Premium Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Ban Công & Tầm Nhìn Ra Sông

review.rating: Hoi An è una città magica e soggiornare presso questo hotel rende tutto perfetto

review.rating: Preis/Leistung stimmt, das Personal außerordentlich freundlich

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ

review.rating: Excellent hotel in a great location to explore Hoi An.

review.comment_negative: It was all excellent - that staff were especially lovely, very helpful and booked us trips and taxis.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: Very welcoming. Breakfast great pastry’s, eggs to order fresh. Location  near old town free bikes to use. Pool clean nobody else seem to use so great for me. Staff available and always happy to help.

review.rating: Een hotel op een toplocatie, met super personeel en een geweldig ontbijt

Het beste hotel dat we in Vietnam gehad hebben!

review.room_type: Phòng Premium Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Ban Công & Tầm Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive: Clean, modern, great pool, staff were very friendly and helpful. It’s far enough from old town for a peaceful night sleep, but close enough to walk and the hotel provides free bicycles.
review.comment_negative: Shower head was a little faulty

review.rating: Juste envie d’y retourner au plus vite !!

This hotel is amazing!!!!clean room, good location, good service.
I’d like to stay again. I’ll highly recommend everyone

review.room_type: Suite Thông Nhau Qua Cửa Nối
review.comment_positive: The staff was extremely kind and helpful. We also asked for help with organisation of transport and it was very well done. Communication with hotel prior to the arrival was very easy. The hotel is very nice, big comfortable rooms, nice pool area.

review.rating: Don’t hesitate to stay here. Property is amazing and location can’t be beat!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive:
Staff was amazing! Very attentive and helpful. Great job at checkin making us feel welcome and explained all of the amenities very clearly.
Breakfast was unbelievable! Anything you could possibly want was offered and presented beautifully.
Spa was reasonably priced and very relaxing.
Pool area was gorgeous and clean. They offer really nice sunbeds on a first come basis-no extra charge.
Really hated to leave! They even gave us gifts as we checked out. Nice touch-very classy!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: Es un hotel boutique, muy lindo, super limpio, el desayuno supero mis expectativas muy completo, variedad de comida occidental y vietnamese , la alberca muy grande , y el personal muy amable, agradezco a Nga todas sus recomendaciones para actividades, el show Hoian memories  show fue espectacular, superior a todos los shows de Broadway que he visto.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: Nice hotel

review.rating: Lovely stay for 3 nights in Hoi An
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: The staff were always super helpful and made our stay as seamless as possible. They were extremely accommodating when we arrived after an early flight. We had booked a transfer via the hotel and when managed to catch a 5.30am flight instead of the 8.15am flight they were able to switch at last minute. When we arrived at the hotel we were offered breakfast, a chance to freshen up and luggage storage whilst we cycled round the town.

review.rating: Extremely helpful staff, great location and very comfortable hotel
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: Staff are extremely helpful and welcoming. Hotel is very comfortable and well located. The free bicycles are an awesome way to get around. Will definitely come back and stay again!

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Thời Thượng Có Ban Công & Tầm Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive: Absolutely excellent hotel. Staff were very helpful. Location is perfect. Hotel room was nice and clean.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: Everything. Clean as a whistle. 5to 10 minute walk from centre of old town close but no noise at nite. Free bikes. Wicked good breakfast buffet. Staff VERY attentive. Room was spacious with big bathroom and deck. Pool was perfect to lie around or dip in during the heat of the day.  Great value. 3 nights including 1 hr private transfer each way from Danang airport plus a bunch of fridge beers for about $70 CDN a night. Can’t beat that. Highly recommend. Probably our favourite spot after a month in Asia. BOOK IT.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: Staff were so friendly and helpful. Really good location as you were close to the old quarter so easy to walk. Great breakfast options.

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình
review.comment_positive: Phòng đơn giản, sạch sẽ. Wifi hơi yếu.

review.rating: From the beginning till the end we felt welcomed!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: The clean room, good service and nice recommendations. Breakfast was also very delicious.

review.rating: Great location, wonderful staff, and comfortable rooms.

review.comment_positive: The staff were so kind and helpful in organizing tours for us in Hoi An. We used the bikes to go to the pottery village and took advantage of their spa deals for a great massage. The breakfast was very nice with both Vietnamese and European options.
review.comment_negative: The A/C was a little weak in our room, but not a big issue at all.

review.comment_positive:
Hotel muy bien ubicado, re-abierto hace muy poco tras el COVID. Detalles puestos con mucho mimo.
Desayuno tipo buffet abundante. 
Pîscina pequeña aunque muy bien aprovechada.
Reservamos un par de actividades con ellos y un servicio de transporte privado a Hue.
Ofrecen bicicletas gratis.
review.comment_negative:
En ocasiones son demasiado insistentes con hacerte contratar servicios extra y (esto sonará fatal pero) están demasiado encima preguntandote qué tal estás.
Tuvimos la mala fortuna de encontrar el hotel de en frente en obras y el aislamiento acústico de la ventana era un poco regulero. Nos despertaron a base de golpes a las 6 am.

review.rating: Great location in a quiet street 5 mins walk from the Ancient Town.  Highly recommended.

review.comment_positive: The pool was great with plenty of sun lounges. The massages at the Spa were exceptional. Great location.  Staff were friendly. There were lots of breakfast options.

review.rating: A nice new place to stay in Hoi An.

review.comment_positive: Very friendly, polite, hardworking and helpful staff. Quiet area but within walking distance to the old city and tourist areas. Even have free bicycles which quest can borrow. The bicycles are well kept and washed everyday.
review.comment_negative: The water outlet from the shower area flowed too slowly.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: It was our best hotel in Vietnam. The staff was amazing, the room was comfy and super clean. The food was delicious, highly recommend this hotel

review.rating: Le Charm is a true Charm

review.comment_positive:
Perfect location, short walking distance from old town. The air conditioning in the room worked well and the pool and outside facilities were simply awesome. 
We found the breakfast on par with similar restaurants in Vietnam.
The staff were amazing with many beautiful smiles greeting you.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
Suite Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Ban Công & Tầm Nhìn Ra Toàn Cảnh
review.comment_positive:
Everything. The location was great, only 100m from the old town and bridge to the night markets, so close but with no lights or noise. the staff were exceptional, baggage, reception, restuarant and cleaners -- friendly, efficent and helpful. rooms full of character. 
Breakfast selection was large and overall value for money great
Please dont mistake the offering of transport and excursions as a "hard sell". From our experience , (as well as the economic benefit in post covid recovery), it is truly an effort to help guests get the most out of their stay.
The little extra things --- forgot power adaptors and asked where i could purchase some -- no problem -borrow 2 of ours
                                   --- had to leave a day early -- no problem -- we wont charge you
                                  --- forgot to return the adaptors so emailed and offered to pay --- no problem -- keep them as a souvenir  11/10
review.comment_negative:
Nothing. 
air con struggles a bit, but it was exceptionally hot at the time and the hotel is trying to be eco friendly with the power off when you leave the room -- all good

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive:
This hotel was probably one of the BEST that we stayed at in Vietnam. The staff were superb, the breakfast , excellent(they make vegetarian options specifically for us ); the free bicycles helped, and the a/c worked liked a charm (it was quite hot when we were there)
we cannot recommend this hotel highly enough- don't think twice!
review.comment_negative: Nothing, would go back in a heartbeat!
