review.comment_positive: God lokation, sødt personale, fin indretning og generelt bare lækre omgivelser. Vil klart anbefale dette hotel!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: What a stunning and welcoming hotel. The staff here are so helpful and made our stay super easy, from the airport pick up to organising the coconut boat tour. The location is about a 5 minute walk away from the beautiful old town which has lots of restaurants and cafes. The pool was refreshing, and breakfast was top-notch (many different options). Our room was clean and tidy (we were given an upgrade on arrival, which was awesome), and the bed was enormous. Would recommend for anyone coming to Hoi An.

review.rating: Fully taken care of in Hoi An
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: The service was exceptional. I was sick during the stay and got taken care of with tea and earlier checkin. Ordering food to the room was no problem. The spa and pool and breakfast were amazing and whatever question or request we had, was being helped.

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình
review.comment_positive: Một nơi ở tạm được, không quá ồn ào. Thích hợp để nghỉ qua đêm.

review.rating: Incredible, amazing food, great location. Friendly & Helpful Staff
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: One of the best Hotels we've stayed in... in any country in the world.... the staff are so welcoming, helpful and can't do enough to ensure your stay is amazing. Situated right on the edge of the old town (5 mins) the breakfast is incredible.... with something for everyone. The rooms are huge, with a lovely balcony and one of the best showers ever. The staff can help arrange all your tours/taxis. And the swimming pool was a bonus when the sun came out. Thank you all so much for making our stay so nice- We will be back
review.comment_negative: Maybe more pillows on the bed

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: Tolle Lage - sehr reichhaltiges Frühstück - großes Zimmer

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: Alles perfekt - Personal, Lage, der Pool, das Zimmer und das Frühstück. Die Cocktails waren auch super. Nach Ankunft hat das Personal auch Vorschläge gemacht wie wir unseren Aufenthalt am besten planen können und auch alle relevanten Tickets gebucht. Besser geht’s nicht :)

review.rating: Great value for money, amazing breakfast, awesome location
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: Awesome location to the Old Quarter with free (well serviced) bikes to get around. The breakfast buffet was incredible with so many delicious options. The staff are helpful and friendly, they were very keen to book tours etc, however we opted not to. Pool is awesome, clean and lovely. The spa service was also great and professional. Our room was amazing - such a good view, clean, large and beautiful - it felt like luxury. Highy recommend staying here!
review.comment_negative: The check in process was a bit long

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ

review.rating: Super Lage und schöne Zimmer. Richtig toller Spa Bereich und herzliches Personal!
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive:
Die Lage ist super, man ist binnen 5 Fußminuten im Zentrum. Das Person ist äußerst freundlich und hilfsbereit. Wir hatten ein kleines Problemchen mit unserem Zimmer und haben es der Rezeption weitergegebenen. Mittags konnten wir problemlos ein neues Zimmer beziehen. Ich würde jedem einen Besuch im Spa empfehlen, hatte dort die besten Rückenmassage meines Lebens! Das Frühstück ist gut, vor allem die vietnamesischen Speisen. Die westlichen Gerichte sind "anders". 
Das Hotel ist sehr zu empfehlen. Das Personal ist sehr freundlich und hilfsbereit! :-) 
Fahrräder können kostenlos ausgeliehen werden.
review.comment_negative: Zimmer etwas hellhörig, TV könnte man ggf. gegen Smart TV austauschen, oder Platz für einen Fire-TV Stick lassen. Aber das sind wirklich nur minimale "Kritikpunkte".

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ

review.rating: An excellent all round hotel, we definitely recommend it.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: This was our favourite hotel of our trip. From check in to check out the staff were so genuine, friendly and helpful. On check in we were given loads of information on the local area, trips and the hotels facilities. One day we used the hotels free bikes for a ride to Esco beach club who the hotel have links to, it was a lovely relaxing day out. The hotel’s location is just a few minutes walk to the old town and the night market. Every morning the hotel manager came round at breakfast to check on all the guests. When we checked out we were gifted some cookies and a beautiful scarf, what a lovely touch, we were sad to leave!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 3 Người/Gia Đình
review.comment_positive: staff were super helpful, facilities was great, location was super convenient, breakfast was decent
review.comment_negative: wifi was good but could have been faster

review.room_type: Suite Thông Nhau Qua Cửa Nối
review.comment_positive: central, spotless, great amenities and staff, breakfast included

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình
review.comment_positive: Dịch vụ ở mức chấp nhận được. Tiện nghi cơ bản, không thiếu thứ gì.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: very kind staff, delicious breakfast every day, easy walking distance to old town and nightlife areas, very comfortable bed.  would stay again!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive:
We stayed two nights in La Charm Hoi An Hotel & Spa. We had a wonderful stay.

The location is absolutely perfect, 5 minutes walk to the Ancient Town. The hotel is beautiful and very clean. The breakfast buffet is very good.

And last but not least… The staff… They are amazing ! A real 5-star service.

Thao did our check-in and she did great. She made us feel very welcome and asked us if we had any plans in Hoi An. She introduced us what to do in Hoi An and the area. It was really nice. This way we were able to have a first idea of all the main things to do.

A big thank you to all the staff and especially Nga who took excellent care of us during all our stay. She was super friendly and helpful. She really went above and beyond to make our stay memorable. It felt like having our personal concierge. We had great recommendations from her, she booked the basket boat tour for us, the tickets for Teh Dar Show which is an absolute must, this show was absolutely incredible ! Nga also anticipated our needs by asking where were we going next and she offered to book the flight tickets with a transfer to the airport for us. She did everything and everything was added on the room bill which was very convenient. 

So if you are thinking about booking this hotel for your stay in Hoi An, don’t hesitate, do it, you will have an amazing stay for sure ! I recommend this establishment 100%.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: El personal muy amable y preocupado de sus huespedes en todo momento, la ubicacion muy buena!
review.comment_negative: El desayuno podria tener mas variedad, pero en general todo bien!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: Staff very friendly
review.comment_negative: Good location great value and staff very helpful

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: Very comfortable room with lovely big bathroom, hotel was recently renovated and it shows. Breakfast was also very good with a wide selection of food, room was cleaned well everyday and staff were very helpful. Pool and gym area also in hotel, gym is small but decent for a hotel gym. Overall would 100% recommend this hotel to anyone at a very affordable price!

review.room_type: Suite Thông Nhau Qua Cửa Nối
Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: Booking la charm hotel was my best decision ever. The hotel is very beautiful and the location is very good. Only 5 minutes walking to the night market. Also I must write about there breakfast. Unlimited food and lots of variety. Every item was very tasty. The stuffs are well mannered and very helpful. Ms nga specially helped me from the beginning of my booking. She helped us to manage our airport pick up to the hotel. Room was very nice and clean. Overall it was more than perfect. I will definitely book the same hotel for my next stay in hoi an. And also I will recommend everyone to book la charm for their stay in hoi an.
review.comment_negative: There were nothing about this property that I didn’t like.

review.rating: Lovely stay, great staff and location
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: The stay was amazing, super friendly staff and the location was superb! We were here over Tet and everything was open and very accommodating and provided great local recommendations! The gift of on checkout was a lovely gesture. Also had a lovely massage, worth the price. Would recommend La charm.
review.comment_negative: The bed was two beds together so sometimes, slept in the gap. Large range of breakfast options, but some of the western options could be improved

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive:
Tout était parfait. Service, chambre, piscine et petit déjeuner au top !
Emplacement parfait également !

review.rating: Hôtel à la deco soignée en un mot charmant
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: Le personnel de l’hôtel est aux petits soins… il suffit de prendre un vélo (preté par l’hôtel) pour arriver dans le vieux quartier quel bonheur de flâner dans les jolies rues animées !
review.comment_negative: L’insonorisation des chambres (bruits de portes, bruits extérieurs)

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: Quel service! Absolument rien à dire. Le personnel avenant et d'une gentillesse. A ne pas confondre avec le sens du commerce, ils sont vraiment gentils et vous partagerons tous les bons plans possibles et astuces

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: Comfortable, safe, clean. Staff were lovely, receptionists were very helpful and responsible. They recognise you and speak to you everyday to find out your needs and do their best to help and provide advice. Very good.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: Alojamiento muy bueno. La ubicación es perfecta, muy cerca de la zona antigua. El desayuno muy variado. La habitación genial, limpia, amplia, la cama era enorme y el baño también muy grande. Hay bicis gratis para poder recorrer la zona. Personal muy atento.
review.comment_negative: El alojamiento es perfecto y realmente se merece esta puntuación, pero insisten demasiado en la valoración y que les pongas un 10.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: Everything was perfect. Stayed their for 3 days and would definitely recommend to everyone.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: La atención de todo el personal

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: Everything was exceptional!

review.rating: Amazing place to stay, close to the old town and the night market.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: The people was very nice and warm. The food at the restaurant is amazing, the breakfast is incredible, lots of options.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: Friendly staff and close to everything
review.comment_negative: Pool water was like a bath ie too hot

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: Schöne Poolanlage, sehr nettes Personal, reichhaltiges Buffet zum Frühstück

review.rating: Incredible breakfast and super friendly service!!
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive:
Fantastic hotel within easy walking distance of the historic old town. We loved our stay, and the staff were extremely helpful!
Some highlights are the buffet breakfast and the relaxing beds by the pool. Would return here in a heartbeat!!
review.comment_negative: Gym equipment could do with a bit of an upgrade but that’s not a bit problem really if you put your mind to it!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: Complete breakfast with continental and vietnamese options. Rooms are clean. The swimming pool is great, also very clean!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 3 Người/Gia Đình
Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: El desayuno el mejor de nuestra estancia en Vietnam. La habitacion súper cómoda la cama. Además está a 5 minutos del centro. Te dan hasta paraguas o bici para que pasees gratis.

review.rating: 這次三天的會安之旅，讓我們對飯店的接待人員、環境、餐點都非常滿意，謝謝您們貼心招待，下一次我會再帶著家人一起造訪，期待下一次的見面
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: 接待人員、環境、餐點，整體的CP值非常的高

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: Great position and staff, very comfortable room, excellent breakfast. Highly recommend !

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: Staff was really great! Em Huong and Em Tuan were really nice.Breakfast was great! I had a good Thai massage.Room was really elegant and quiet
review.comment_negative: Mattress was a little soft for me

reviewer.name: Amlan
reviewer.country: United Arab Emirates (Các Tiểu Vương Quốc Ả Rập Thống Nhất)

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 3 Người/Gia Đình
review.comment_positive: Everything from the ever helpful staff to the lavish breakfast spread

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: The reception team was superb, they made us feel like home. Staff was very friendly from the beginning. They were really helpful the whole time, making our travel in Hoi An unforgettable.

review.rating: Home from home, very relaxing and perfect base from which to enjoy Hoi An
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive:
Great location very close to canal and Old Town (5mins walking) but in a quiet and very peaceful street - a convenient little sanctuary!
All staff were friendly and very helpful and always with smiles. The lady in concierge was especially helpful and helped with anything we needed from laundry to ideas for sightseeing.
Restaurant serves a tasty breakfast with a very wide selection for Asian and Western tastes. Lunch menu was also very appetising (we didn’t have dinner).
Lovely garden area with fair sized pool and complementary bikes. We took advantage of these to cycle the 6km to their sister hotel on the  beach where we were welcomed with clean towels for lounging.
review.comment_negative: Nothing to dislike. Separate bath and shower is great but the bath has a very strange rounded base to try to sit in (if you’re more than a metre tall 🤣)

review.rating: Perfect place to stay. Highly recommended
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: Breakfast was great with a variety of fresh food. Location is just walking distance to the centre.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: Everything was perfect, the room very clean. And staff are so friendly & helpful. I booked excursion through the hotel. The breakfast options are great. I hired a bike from hotel for free which was fantastic. Great location and they also picked me up & dropped me to airport.

review.rating: Perfect location for enjoying Hoi An old town, great hotel with very attentive staff.
review.room_type: Phòng Premium Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Ban Công & Tầm Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive: The location of the hotel was perfect, a very short walk or cycle into the old town, but it was quiet at night. Staff here were so nice and attentive, they give great advice on things to do in the area. Food by the pool was also great! I recommend the river view room - amazing view of mountains and sunset.

review.rating: A wonderful place in Hoi An!
review.room_type: Phòng Premium Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Ban Công & Tầm Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive:
This property is in a quiet section of Hoi An and a short 5 minute walk to the hustle and bustle of the tourist area. It’s a perfect location. The room was clean, spacious and just right. The bed was amazing! We slept very well. The breakfast was delicious. However, the best part of the hotel are the staff! They are friendly and attentive. Nga always had great suggestions for us and made everything we wanted to do happen. 
If you want to do a couple of interesting tours, ask for Lucky and do the fish market tour and the food tour.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: Hotel is great! Huge breakfast buffet with lots of yummy options. Free bikes made it super easy to get into Hoi An. Great location close to the old quarter. Staff was super helpful.
review.comment_negative: The Wi-Fi went out a few times. The staff worked very hard to try to get it back online quickly.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: Tot. Un bon esmorzar, una piscina agradable, una habitació comfortable i ben decorada. Personal atent.

review.rating: Great location and staff made my stay memorable.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: I liked how attentive they were from booking to checkout. We were always greeted and asked if they can help in anyway, the breakfast was great. The location is excellent and close to the river/ancient town.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 3 Người/Gia Đình

review.rating: Lovely helpful friendly staff. Location was within walking distance to everything we needed.
review.room_type: Suite Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Ban Công & Tầm Nhìn Ra Toàn Cảnh
review.comment_positive: Locality and breakfast

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Thời Thượng Có Ban Công & Tầm Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive: The staff was wondering and very helpful. They helped arrange tours and provided a safe place to exchange money. The breakfast buffet was tasty, with many options available. Great location, just a short walk to Old Town.
review.comment_negative: Nothing I didn't like. Happy with my stay.

review.rating: Nice hotel with a pool in central location
review.room_type: Suite Thông Nhau Qua Cửa Nối
review.comment_positive:
- Great pool and in a decent location 
- clean
- helpful staff 
- possibility of an interconnecting family room
review.comment_negative:
- the rooms have no soundproofing at all. We could hear the lift and people late at night and early in the morning as they were coming in and out
- At the end of our stay the staff were VERY pushy, and somewhat inappropriate, to rate the property a ten and only a ten. I picked the hotel based on reviews, which I now realise may not show the whole picture.

review.rating: Schöner, entspannter Aufenthalt in Hoi An
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: Das Personal leistet hervorragende Arbeit, sowohl an der Rezeption als auch beim Frühstücksbuffet. Die Reinigung der Zimmer war perfekt. Die Unterkunft hat eine gute Lage und das Frühstück war sehr gut.

review.rating: Gorgeous hotel! The rooms are large and luxurious.
review.room_type: Phòng Premium Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Ban Công & Tầm Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive: Great buffet ! Some of the items change daily.

review.rating: A perfect stay in a beautiful hotel with fabulous staff. Stay here if you are staying in Hoi An! Couldn’t recommend it e
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive:
This property was just fabulous! From the staff, the decor, the facilities, the location and the food. I would recommend this to anyone who is staying in Hoi An. 

The location is perfect, as it’s on a quiet street but yet, if you walk 2 minutes down the road you are in the busy streets of the old city. 

The staff were incredibly helpful and friendly. The warmth you felt as soon as you arrived was so welcomed. They made our stay so relaxing and easy. The welcome drink and the introduction to Hoi An was fantastic. We got to plan out our trip as soon as we arrived.

The room was clean, the beds were so comfy and the room service was great! 

The free bikes is a lovey perk, although I didn’t use them. I saw lots of people availing of the free service. A great touch! 

All in all, I would recommend this hotel to anyone!
review.comment_negative: Nothing, I loved everything about this place!

review.rating: Perfect location, lovely staff - highly recommend
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: The services are exceptional and the location is optimal for travelling in the city. They accommodate to many of my changes in schedule and made my stay amazingly pleasant:) I highly recommend it to everyone who wishes to travel in Hoi An!

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Thời Thượng Có Ban Công & Tầm Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive: The staff were amazing the rooms were lovely and comfortable

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive:
Tolles Personal, freies Leihrad, super Pool zum Ausschwimmen.
Die Spa-Angebote sind ebenfalls großartig.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: La proximité avec le centre ville et la gentillesse du personnel la chambre très confortable

review.rating: Perfect stay in beautiful Hoi An
review.room_type: Suite Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Ban Công & Tầm Nhìn Ra Toàn Cảnh
review.comment_positive:
This is was our favourite hotel in our whole time in Vietnam.
All the staff there are so friendly and helpful, especially the ladies on the front desk, they really spent time to ask us how our stay was going and if they could do anything else to help. We did several day trips and excursions and they helped us out with several things, they really went above and beyond. 

The room is beautiful and spacious, great bathroom and huge bed. Breakfast has plenty of nice options. The hotel is really well located about 10 minutes from the main parts of the old town and we made use of the free bikes. The pool area is great and we didn’t have any issues getting sun beds at any time. Wonderful hotel and such value for money, we’d love to come back soon.
review.comment_negative: There was nothing really but yoghurt at breakfast would be a nice option.

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình
review.comment_positive: Dịch vụ ở mức bình thường. Bữa sáng đơn giản.

review.room_type: Suite Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Ban Công & Tầm Nhìn Ra Toàn Cảnh
review.comment_positive: Nice staff. Good breakfast.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: Super mooi hotel. Vriendelijk personeel. Uitstekende locatie. We hebben er enorm van genoten!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: La verdad que nos ha gustado todo de este hotel, el almuerzo es espectacular, tienes una variedad infinita de opciones, tanto que en lugar de desayunar puedes hasta comer. La ubicación es excepcional, a 8 min caminando del centro donde vas a comprar y comer porque ya el propio hotel está en el centro. El personal es maravilloso, atento, respetuoso y te ayudan en todo lo que necesites, hasta nos han echo un regalo de despedida dándonos un detalle. Las camas son cómodas no, lo siguiente... creo que no hemos dormido tan bien en años. La verdad que si volviera no dudaría en volverme a alojar allí.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive:
Very nice hotel. Liked staying here.
Super close to ancient town Hoi An.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: Sehr schönes Hotel in zentraler Lage. Fahrräder stehen ebenfalls zur Verfügung, um die Gegend zu erkunden. Top - würde jederzeit wieder kommen.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: Very helpful staff. Great spa and breakfast. Rooms were comfortable and well equipped

review.room_type: Phòng Premium Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Ban Công & Tầm Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive: 酒店很美，很有越南传统文化风格，房间内就能拍出很美的照片，酒店距离会安古城步行五分多钟就能到，酒店也提供免费的自行车，在会安古城骑行自行车是非常美好的体验。退房的时候，酒店还赠送了美味的饼干，这次住宿超出了我的预期，非常感谢！

review.rating: Duyen and the team made sure we had an incredible stay for our first time in Hoi An and to help us celebrate our anniver
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: Friendly and attentive staff, beautiful pool, great breakfast

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
Suite Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Ban Công & Tầm Nhìn Ra Toàn Cảnh
review.comment_positive:
Excelente localização e excelente serviço.
Simpatia e disponibilidade de toda a equipa.

review.rating: It was last minute booking and we absolutely loved it here. Staffs are very friendly and helpful. Definitely come back w
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
Phòng Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Thời Thượng Có Ban Công & Tầm Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive: Excellent Hotel staff are full of beans, lots of food choices, nice quiet pool, hot weather, very clean, most of the mod cons you could need.
review.comment_negative:
Lighting in the room was a bit too dim, and complicated switch system. Not all on one panel near the bed, So you need to get out of bed to make sure every switch is off! 

Poolside Food & Drink extremley poor choice, no waiting staff and no outside bar.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: Uitstekende voorzieningen, heerlijk ontbijt, uiterst vriendelijk en behulpzaam personeel, zorgzaam. kwaliteitscontrole en prima hulp bij organiseren uitstapjes.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: All the service are impressed us, we had so much great time in Hoi An, wonderful breakfast, lots of choice, even we are vegetarian, the service told us which dishes are okay for us, very thankful. And the hotel close to old town, free bicycle. Comfy room and lobby, we had wonderful new year time in Hoi An.🥰

review.room_type: Phòng Premium Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Ban Công & Tầm Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive: This is a wonderful hotel. The welcome was so friendly and the staff so helpful and informative. Went to Hoi An during my birthday and got a cake and the staff singing 'Happy Birthday' at breakfast. I never told them, they must have got it from my passport. The room was great. I never used the swimming pool but it looked big. Located just outside the old town, which means you need to walk and it can be hard work in the hot weather. Breakfasts were excellent. Wish we had spent 4 days here instead of Hanoi. One of the best hotels I have stayed in.

review.room_type: Suite Thông Nhau Qua Cửa Nối

review.rating: The hotel and staff exceeded my expectations. One of the best hotels I have stayed in.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: The hotel was beautiful and in a convenient location. The staff was extremely welcoming and helpful. One of the best hotels I have stayed in.
review.comment_negative: No complaints, the hotel and staff exceeded my expectations.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 3 Người/Gia Đình
review.comment_positive: 全体的なコストパフォーマンスやロケーションが良いと感じた。豪華なグレードではないが、中流家庭の旅行に相応しいグレードと思う。バスタブがある部屋は、日本人にはうれしい。リピート利用しても良いと思った。
review.comment_negative: 3泊したが、荷物の収納スペースが足りなかった。スーツケースを拡げるスペース、またはクローゼット、ドロワーなどがもう少し必要。チェックアウトの際に、ホテルの評価を高く口コミに投稿するよう、しつこく依頼されたことは、印象を悪くした。洗練された接客を目指して欲しい。

review.rating: Excellent stay with most friendly and attentive service.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive:
The hotel is really well appointed, the rooms are large and have very stylish bathrooms. The beds are very big and super comfortable. Each room has complimentary tea, coffee and water, as well as delicious coconut cake. We appreciated the cold beer in the mini fridge.
The free breakfast spread was great, from Asian to Western tastes, with wonderful fresh fruit juices and iced coffees. We didn’t stay long enough to make use of the pool, but the kids enjoyed the gym.
Great location, close to the old town and night market, but quiet and peaceful.

review.room_type: Suite Thông Nhau Qua Cửa Nối
review.comment_positive: Good location, big and clean room, nice spa, and very professional staff. Especially the service clients staff, Ms. Nga is very kind and made us feel cared. Because of the hotel staff our stay at Hoi An was very special.
review.comment_negative: Nothing! We will definitely came back to the hotel soon!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: Generalnie hotel jest bardzo ładny i zadbany. W środku jest czysto i pachnąco. Pokoje są duże, z bardzo wygodnymi i ogromnymi łóżkami. Do tego pokój był z balkonem, na ostatnim piętrze, z dobrym widokiem na okolicę. Do centrum było blisko.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: Personalet var utroligt venligt og vi fik virkeligt god value for money.

review.rating: Book this hotel. The staff is the best.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 3 Người/Gia Đình
review.comment_positive: Staff was the best. We took complimentary bikes to the beach. Very clean rooms and public area. Good breakfast. I was always kept in the loop via WhatsApp regarding the room or yours.

review.rating: Comfy beds are always a bonus
review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Thời Thượng Có Ban Công & Tầm Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive: Staff were great and location fantastic.

review.rating: A great hotel in Hoi An.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: Our 4 night stay in La Charm Hotel Hoi An was very comfortable in a spacious room and bathroom with a balcony. The breakfast was superb with many different offerings. The staff were friendly and very helpful with useful information and assistance to book excursions. We enjoyed a swim in the pool and having a drink in the garden. Highly recommended!

review.rating: Ấm áp và thân thiện cho những chuyến đi bộ tham quan Phố Cổ Hội An.
review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Thời Thượng Có Ban Công & Tầm Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive:
Nhân viên tiếp tân và phục  vụ rất thân thiện và nhiệt tình. Chúng tôi đến khách sạn vài tiếng trước giờ nhận phòng đã hẹn. Sau khi được chào đón thân thiện, chúng tôi gửi hành lý và đi bộ ra ngoài Phố cổ Hội An sau đó trở về vào lúc 12h trưa, trước giờ nhận phòng 2 tiếng nhưng vẫn được hỗ trợ nhận phòng sớm. 
Phòng ở giống hệt như hình mô tả, không gian sạch sẽ và ấm cúng. Ban công của phòng rất thích hợp để uống một chút gì đó và tâm sự. 
Bể bơi rất sạch sẽ, phục vụ khăn tắm miễn phí và có nhiều ghế nằm cho tất cả mọi người.
Bữa sáng buffet nhiều món cơ bản, có thể phục vụ cho hầu hết mọi du khách. 
Chúng tôi đã lưu trú ở đây 2 đêm, và tôi rất ngạc nhiên rằng có vẻ như chúng tôi là người Việt Nam duy nhất trong khách sạn
review.comment_negative:
Không, với chúng tôi mọi trải nghiệm đều rất ổn với chi phí đã trả và kì vọng trước chuyến đi. 
Quầy bar của khách sạn phục vụ một số loại đồ uống cả có cồn và không cồn, nhưng tôi nghĩ  sau này nên cung cấp đa dạng loại nước hơn nữa.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: Great location, great service, very happy with the stay

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ

El desayuno, realmente bueno. Tanto comida occidental como asiática.
review.comment_negative:
Si tuviese que poner algún aspecto negativo, es que no está en la ciudad antigua.  Se encuentra a 1 km de distancia.

No obstante, es un paseo agradable.

review.rating: Our favourite hotel from our visit to Vietnam.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: We loved everything about this hotel! The room was excellent, with a comfortable bed, a balcony, an effective air conditioner and a small refrigerator stocked with cold water and other drinks. We made good use of the swimming pool and poolside lounge chairs. Breakfast was superb, with a huge choice of foods suited to both Western and Asian preferences. But best of all were the staff, who were courteous, friendly, knowledgeable about the local area and activities,  and very professional at all times, especially Ms T and Ms D. If we ever come to Hoi An we will definitely stay here again.

review.comment_positive:
The room was a good size, clean and comfortable.
The hotel's location was within easy walking distance of the old town.
The staff try very hard, although, as the hotel has only recently reopened, there are some training issues.
The pool is a good size with a reasonable number of sunbeds available. Hopefully, the mothballed building site overlooking the pool will not become live any time soon!
review.comment_negative:
Breakfast is geared to Asian guests although there is an egg station.
The hotel would be very difficult for guests with mobility issues - there are even steps from the foyer to access the lift!!
The absence of a full length mirror in the bedroom!

Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive:
Das Hotel liegt fussläufig entfernt von der schönen Altstadt. Für weitere Touren stehen zudem kostenlose Fahrräder zur Verfügung. Im Gegensatz zu den anderen Rädern, die ich in Hoi An gesehen habe, sind diese Räder sehr neuwertig und auch für längere Ausflüge geeignet. 
Das Personal ist sehr freundlich, hilfsbereit und zuvorkommend. Im Hotel selbst werden auch Touren angeboten. 
Das Frühstück ist sehr umfangreich und es ist für jeden Geschmack etwas dabei.
Das GYM ist zwar klein aber für ein kleines Workout im Urlaub vollkommen ausreichend.
Ich wäre gerne länger geblieben, wenn ich mehr Zeit gehabt hätte

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 3 Người/Gia Đình

review.comment_positive: The facilities and breakfast were great. It is also a very convenient location which is a short walk to the old town center. The availability of bicycles is amazing and make exploring the surrounding areas easy and convenient.

review.rating: Fantastic room, amazing breakfast buffet, free bike rental and really helpful staff

Pool was nice and clean.

review.room_type: Suite Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Ban Công & Tầm Nhìn Ra Toàn Cảnh
review.comment_positive: Lovely property. Very clean, stylish and good location. Easy walk to Old Town but away from the hustle and bustle. Staff were all lovely and very helpful

review.comment_positive: Great location just a 5-10 minute walk from Old Town and the night markets. Staff were very kind and helpful. Breakfast was varied - loved the egg bar - great omelettes 👌definitely recommend a stay here

Dr Silva

review.rating: A wonderful place to stay in Hoi An
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: This is a gem of a hotel in Hoi An and we absolutely loved our stay here. It offers great value for money and feels very luxurious. Our room was very spacious and comfortable and had a lovely view of Hoi An. The staff (especially Na and the other ladies at reception) were all very warm, friendly and helpful, going out of their way to speak to us and help us to plan our stay in Hoi An. They helped us with booking day trips, show tickets and we were able to rent bicycles for free. The buffet breakfast is great and staff tried to accommodate our needs by providing extra vegan options during our stay. Highly recommend staying here!
review.comment_negative: The only problem we had was that there were a lot of mosquitoes in our room (bathroom in particular). Staff did their best to help with this by spraying the area for us but the mosquitoes seemed to return after the cleaners had been in and opened doors/windows. If the hotel is able to take a few extra steps to keep mosquitoes out, it really would be perfect.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Thời Thượng Có Ban Công & Tầm Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi

review.rating: Amazing hotel - staff make the experience. Great location as well.
review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Thời Thượng Có Ban Công & Tầm Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive: We loved our stay here. The staff are by far the best part of the hotel - they’re so friendly and gave us so many tips on what to do in Hoi An and also helped organise a lot of stuff for us (tickets to the memory show, coconut boat ride etc). The room was also really nice (very comfortable bed) and we enjoyed the pool as well. The location is also fantastic - less than a 10 minute walk to get to the centre of the Old Town.
review.comment_negative: Nothing - we don’t have anything bad to say about our trip!

review.rating: Nhân viên nhiệt tình đáng yêu. Ở thêm 2 tiếng check out nhưng kg tính phí . Dvu spa tuyệt vời , ăn sáng rất ngon . Nhất

Đi ra chợ đêm tầm 6-700m, có thể đi bộ hoặc đạp xe. Xe đạp miễn phí, có ghế ngồi dành riêng cho trẻ em nên gia đình nào có em bé không cần quá lo lắng. Buffet sáng cũng khá đa dạng. Bể bơi sạch sẽ, ngày nhà mình bơi 2 lần sáng và chiều, em bé và các bà thích mê, có sục tại bể nhưng mở theo giờ thôi. Nói chung nếu có dịp quay lại Hội An sẽ tiếp tục chọn La Charm.

Phòng Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Thời Thượng Có Ban Công & Tầm Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive:
This might be the best hotel I ever stayed in. If not the best, definitely my favourite. So where to start?

Rooms are clean, large, and modern. I got one with a balcony and it was worth the extra expense. The pool area is brilliant with beds of different types and a great mix of sun and shade. You could spend all day there.

The staff are incredible. I don’t think I’ve ever experienced a group that is so intent on exceeding guest expectations at every opportunity. From your welcome drink to your checkout, they go over and above. Nothing is too much trouble. 

Location is the best in Hoi Ann. I did a fair bit of walking around and can say that with 100% confidence. Only 5 minutes to the old town but in a quiet area so you can escape the chaos when you want to wind down. Free bicyles a great perk too. You can ride to the countryside in less than 10 minutes.

I didn’t do any activities through the hotel, but they can organize pretty much anything. You always pay a little more than if you do it yourself but that’s to be expected. Most tours looked pretty good value. They did organise an airport drop off for me at 3:45am (brutal I know) and that went very smoothly. 

I had one meal at the hotel. It was nice and the menu pricing was reasonable. Again, slightly higher than if you went outside but you expect that and still cheap by western standards. Breakfast buffet was great with heaps of choices. 

Overall, I would highly recommend La Charm for anyone coming to Hoi An. It really captures the charm (pun intended) of the town, whilst matching the service standards you would expect from a larger hotel chain. Well done and thank you!
review.comment_negative:
I did identify a couple of small opportunities that could make the hotel even better. 

Firstly, the gym. There is a decently sized dedicated space but it’s a few pieces of equipment off being usable for a regular gym goer. If La Charm invested in a dumbbell rack with different sized dumbbells and a cable crossover machine with different handles you could do pretty much any workout there. It’s still much better than a lot of hotel gyms in Vietnam, but given the effort to carve out the space, it seems a waste not to finish it off with those last few pieces of equipment. 

Secondly, I have dietary restrictions and it would be great if the hotel menu listed allergens. For example, putting a GF or DF beside food items to say whether they are gluten free or dairy free. It’s very common in western countries but nobody does it in Vietnam which makes dining out a hassle. Plenty of guests like me would appreciate it and as a bonus would probably eat most their meals at the hotel. You’d even get outsiders coming in to eat once word got out.

2 points de détail:
- l’insistance du personnel pour nous convaincre de les noter 10 dans le questionnaire d’évaluation de booking.com
- après nous avoir écrit que le bus limousine pour Hué nous déposerait devant notre hôtel, la réception nous a finalement dit que ce n’était pas possible car notre hôtel n’était soit disant pas accessible aux véhicules motorisés. Le chauffeur nous a donc déposés à 600 m de l’hôtel. En arrivant (à pied donc) à l’hôtel nous avons constaté que de nombreux bus circulaient dans la rue de l’hôtel et il y en avait même un garé devant.

review.rating: Ich hatte einen ausgezeichneten Aufenthalt in diesem Hotel mit äusserst freundlichem Personal.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive:
Ich hatte einen wundervollen Aufenthalt in diesem zentralen Hotel! Die Mitarbeitenden waren äusserst freundlich und zuvorkommend, und sie gingen auf alle meine Anliegen ein. Das Frühstück war einfach grandios – besonders beeindruckend fand ich, wie sie sich um jedes Detail kümmerten. Einer unserer Gruppenmitglieder hatte Zöliakie, und das Hotel bot ihr eine Auswahl an glutenfreien Optionen.
Unser Zimmer war geräumig, schön und vor allem sehr sauber – genau so, wie man es sich für einen angenehmen Aufenthalt wünscht. Ich war auch beeindruckt davon, dass das Hotel eine Motorradvermietung anbietet. Das gab uns die Freiheit, die Umgebung auf eigene Faust zu erkunden. Ausserdem konnten wir die Gegend mit den kostenlosen Fahrrädern des Hotels erkunden, was eine tolle Möglichkeit war, die Umgebung zu entdecken.
Insgesamt war mein Aufenthalt hier einfach perfekt. Ich kann dieses Hotel nur wärmstens empfehlen und werde mit Sicherheit wiederkommen!
review.comment_negative: Die sanitären Anlagen sind in die Jahre gekommen, der Wasserdruck könnte besser sein.

review.comment_positive:
Habitación muy tranquila ,amplia y limpia. Baño acorde a la habitación. Desayuno muy variado y rico. La amabilidad del personal supera cualquier expectativa. La piscina muy agradable y bien orientada de forma que daba el sol todo el día.
A 10 min andando del centro histórico. Ubicación perfecta para estar en el ambiente del night market y tranquilidad total para dormir.
El restaurante muy bueno tanto en cocina Vietnamita como en platos internacionales. repetimos varias veces.
Resaltar de nuevo la amabilidad del personal, adelantándose a nuestras necesidades de taxis, excursiones, etc.
Las galletas de coco que nos dieron de despedida están estupendas!
Volveremos

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive:
We've been to Hoi An many times but it was our first time staying in this hotel as it's quite new and this is by far our favourite.

Everything was perfect from the moment we arrived. The location is super, less than 5 minutes walking into the heart of the old town. Beds are super comfy, as was the cot for our baby. Good variety at breakfast for both Vietnamese and foreign dishes, juices, coffee, fruit, croissants and an egg station.

The highlight of the hotel is their staff. From the moment we met the concierge men at the door and the receptionists, the house keeping staff and the staff working in the restaurant, everybody was super kind and helpful. We met some really lovely people and we will definitely return for that alone. They were all really kind to us and particularly entertaining our 7 month old baby. He will he wondering where all his friends are at breakfast at home. Thank you for everything.

review.room_type: Suite Thông Nhau Qua Cửa Nối
Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: Très bon hôtel, personnel très gentil. Je recommande

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: Lovely hotel just minutes from the Old Town. Rooms are spacious and pool area looked lovely (but didn’t get chance to use it). Staff are very helpful.

review.room_type: Suite Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Ban Công & Tầm Nhìn Ra Toàn Cảnh
Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive:
Die Unterkunft hat sich um alles mögliche für uns gekümmert. Wir haben viele gute Empfehlungen für Schneider und Lederwaren aber auch Restaurants bekommen. Das Personal war jeder Zeit persönlich und auch über WhatsApp erreichbar und hat sich um all unsere Anliegen perfekt gekümmert. Das Personal ist überaus freundlich und unterstützt gerne wir hatten das Gefühl sehr persönlich betreut zu werden. Das hat uns sehr gefallen auch um unsere weitere Reise hat man sich fabelhaft gekümmert, obwohl wir sehr kurzfristig angefragt haben. 
Die Lage ist sehr gut, in der Fußläufigen Nähe der Altstadt und mit dem Fahrrad (welches mal kostenlos gestellt bekommt) an den Strand (privat Strand mit Liegen und Sonnenschirmen) und erreichbar.

review.room_type: Suite Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Ban Công & Tầm Nhìn Ra Toàn Cảnh
Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: Great staff, room and swimming pool. They also offer free bikes!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: First of all, the hotel communicated before we arrived, and offered inexpensive and competitively priced transport services, which we also used to the airport at departure. At arrival we were warmly welcomed and informed about possible activities in the area. It was very convenient to order tickets to cultural events at the front desk. Our cheapest room was also upgraded to a higher standard room with a balcony with a view. The breakfast was very good.  Not the least was there a large variety of fresh fruit as well as egg dishes and soups made by the cooks. We also would like to mention the excellent and inexpensive laundry service. In addition, the family members who used the spa and massage services  were very pleased.
review.comment_negative: It rained a lot during our stay, which of course was not the hotel's responsibility. They provided umbrellas and services to help us out.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: Miss Nga and her team have been the most welcoming and helpful. Fast email response, giving best recommendations be it food, places to visit or entertainment hotspots. Staffs were kindhearted and friendly. Facilities and place of stay are very comfortable, clean and convenient. Would have given it 11 out of 10!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: Excellent all around. Extremely helpful and professional service. Location, rooms and atmosphere could not have been better. Feel relaxed and refreshed after staying in Le Charm.
review.comment_negative: That we didn’t stay here longer!

review.room_type: Suite Thông Nhau Qua Cửa Nối
review.comment_positive:
Lovely spacious and clean rooms in a beautiful hotel located right near the old town.
The staff are super helpful and friendly, nothing is too much trouble. We normally do not use spa facilities available at hotels, but we did treat ourselves this trip during the hottest time of the day and it was absolutely amazing.
The pool was also a welcome relief at the end of sightseeing in very hot weather.
Breakfast is plentiful and delicious. 
We will definitely stay here again when visiting Hoi An.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: Everything, from the moment we stepped from the taxi to the moment we pulled away from the hotel! Amazingly friendly staff, we were instantly upgraded on arrival. The hotel is classical in its appearance. The pool area was amazing. We had to leave very early and the staff made two breakfast boxes and also gave us gifts on our departure.
review.comment_negative: Nothing, everything perfect. Our best hotel in Vietnam so far.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive:
清潔感があり快適に過ごせました。
スパやプールも楽しめました。

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: We really enjoyed our stay. The staff were very lovely and helpful and the location was excellent, only 4 minutes walk to the old town but much quieter at night. We would definitely come back here again and highly recommend.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 3 Người/Gia Đình
review.comment_positive: Nice hotel , good breakfast and friendly staff.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: Everything. All the staff are very friendly and polite. Special thanks to Miss Nga who was very accommodating. Rooms are very clean  . Breakfast was a delight. Will recommend to friends and family.

review.room_type: Phòng Premium Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Ban Công & Tầm Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive: The room was very clean and comfortable and we love that it had a balcony.  The staff were exceptionally helpful and friendly. The food and cocktails were amazing! We were very happy with our stay.
review.comment_negative: There is nothing we did not enjoy.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: We loved the convenience of free bike hire. We used them every day! We took the bikes out at 6am each day and ride through the rice paddies and quiet outskirts of town! Then we came back to a lovely warm breakfast. Lots of food options and staff were so kind. They genuinely try to help with everything and go the extra mile. We also liked that the hotel is in a quiet part of town, but just 5 mins walk from the busy streets!

review.rating: Beautiful, peaceful hotel and still very close to the old town
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: beautiful outside pool area, delicious breakfast and spacious rooms with balcony and great views from the higher floors. Oh and the staff is very kind and helpful. We booked a transfer from the airport with the hotel and everything went very smoothly. Location is also perfect

review.rating: The best hotel and the best quality service. I would recommend to anyone coming to Hoi An
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive:
Absolutely excellent service. My friend and I have been travelling for 9 weeks now. Staying in 4/5 star hotels from Bali, Thailand, to Vietnam. This is our favourite. It is beautiful, situated in the heart of Han Oi, with bikes to travel to wherever we like. By far the best service we've had in the whole 9 weeks. The most warming welcome with a delicious fresh fruit juice and advice on an itinerary for our trip in Han Oi. Super helpful and friendly staff. They were always checking up on us and making sure we were happy. They gave us all the tips on where to go, if we needed anything they were there. We originally booked in for 1 night but we ended up staying 3 because of joe much we loved it. We got 2 for 1 on cocktails and also massages. We booked in an hour full body massage and it was delightful. We also did numerous activities that we booked through the hotel and they were the same price as what you would book through the website, this included a taxi to and from the hotel too.
We don't have a bad word to sav about this hotel and everything that comes with it. 10/10. Would come back in a heart beat.

review.rating: Das La Charm hat viel Charme
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive:
Das Frühstücksbuffet war sensationell mit sehr viel Auswahl.
Das Hotel ist sehr nah beim Zentrum und an der Rezeption bekommt man viel Auswahl zum etwas zu Unternehmen. Z.b. die Hoi An Memories Show, sehr zu empfehlen!!
Auch die Taxifahrt zum Flughafen nach Danang war vom Hotel aus organisiert und günstiger als Grab.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive:
A lot to like. The location is close to the old town (5-15 min walk depending on point of interest) without being smack bang in the chaos. The balcony, toilet and rooms are very nice (extra points for the water pressure). Room service was prompt and the reception staff were ridiculously quick in finding us very comfortable transport to our trip to Da Nang. 
I genuinely regret not booking this place for our entire hoi an trip.
review.comment_negative: The room can be a touch noisy at night from other guest movements and external things (albeit hearing rooster crowing seems to be a theme across all our hotels).

review.room_type: Suite Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Ban Công & Tầm Nhìn Ra Toàn Cảnh
review.comment_positive: Sehr gute Lage nur 4 Minuten zur Altstadt. Das Personal ist mehr als freundlich und es kommt echt rüber. Ich würde wieder ein Zimmer mit Aussicht nehmen.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: コスパのいいホテル

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: Exceptional service by the staff. They made sure that your needs are met. They make it a point to check in with how you are doing every morning.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ

review.rating: It was a wonderful experience in Hoi An. Will definitely visit again.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: I loved the breakfast spread and the location of the hotel

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive:
Super Lage und Personal war sehr freundlich!
Alles sehr sauber und gepflegt.
Räder und Moped Verleih war super easy und hat gut geklappt!
Würden wieder hierher kommen!

review.room_type: Suite Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Ban Công & Tầm Nhìn Ra Toàn Cảnh
Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive:
Muy limpio y personal muy amable 
Hotel nuevo

review.rating: Wonderful hotel and staff, and a fabulous stay!
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive:
Beautifully decorated, staff could not have been more helpful or attentive without being intrusive. Breakfast very tasty. Great location, close enough to the Old Town for an easy walk, far enough away to avoid a noisy evening!
Really good value for money, and we were made to feel like we were staying somewhere special - it is special, will return if visiting Hoi An again.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive:
朝食は最高でした。プールも綺麗スパ良かった
スタッフの対応が良かった

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive:
部屋がアンティーク風で綺麗
スタッフが親切
静かな環境
review.comment_negative: 口コミを今すぐ投稿する様せかされた点

review.room_type: Suite Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Ban Công & Tầm Nhìn Ra Toàn Cảnh

review.rating: Clean, nice, and spacious room with bathtub! Few minutes walk to the ancient town.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: The staff are friendly and they work really hard to make sure that the hotel guests will have a comfortable stay at the hotel. Prior to the booking dates, they will check and confirm any special requests for the room. The room is also very spacious (bathroom and bedroom). The bed is very comfortable. There is also a wide selection of salads, bread and pastries, asian dishes, and fruits for breakfast. The pool area is a great place to lounge at with lots of comfy and wide sun beds. There are also lots of free bicycles in good condition that you can use to go around the town. Overall, we had a lovely stay! :)
review.comment_negative: The AC is fine during the morning and night time, but hopefully it can be cooler during noontime.

review.rating: Charming and wonderful stay. Would love to come again!
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: Super helpful and happy staff. Clean and spacious. Terrific breakfasts and fitness room and pool

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive:
Frühstück war sehr gut und die Lage war super . Die Altstadt ist fussläufig erreichbar. 
Das Personal war sehr hilfsbereit und freundlich.

review.rating: Hôtel idéal pour un séjour à Hoi An
review.room_type: Suite Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Ban Công & Tầm Nhìn Ra Toàn Cảnh
review.comment_positive:
Tout est fait pour que le client se sente bien, la chambre était très sympa et le lit immense! 
Jolie vue !

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ

review.rating: Schöne, feine und erholsame Ferien in Hoi An
review.room_type: Suite Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Ban Công & Tầm Nhìn Ra Toàn Cảnh
review.comment_positive: Sehr freundliches, hilfsbereites Personal. Sehr sauberes Zimmer mit Balkon. Das Frühstücksbuffet war vom feinsten für Vietnam.

review.room_type: Phòng Premium Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Ban Công & Tầm Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive: Very nice staff, clean room
review.comment_negative:
Wifi was not strong enough
Tivi was simple, no connection to wifi, youtube or other common app

review.room_type: Suite Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Ban Công & Tầm Nhìn Ra Toàn Cảnh
review.comment_positive: 飯店的員工十分友善親切，笑容滿面，熱心協助朋友取消訂房退費事宜。房間風格懷舊、顏色鮮明，床很舒服。

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: the staff is helpful and render very good service.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Thời Thượng Có Ban Công & Tầm Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive: Lovely property, great location. Delightful pool, with Bali beds. Room had a real luxurious feel

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive:
Après avoir enchaîné quelques logements sommaires, nous avions besoin d'un peu de confort. Et nous avons été servi! 
Avec un lit de pas loin de 6m² et très confortable, les nuits ont été très reposantes. 
La chambre est spacieuse et propre. 
L'hôtel est juste à 5 min à pied de la vieille ville. Et la location de vélo est gratuite.
La piscine est toute en longueur et très agréable.
Le petit déjeuné est varié et très bon et le personnel est au petit soin.

review.room_type: Phòng Premium Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Ban Công & Tầm Nhìn Ra Sông
review.comment_positive: Great hotel facilities and location. We would love to come back.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive:
- The room was absolutely beautiful, spacious, clean and had a traditional feel to it.
- Staff were so kind and helpful.
- Location was amazing, just outside the busyness of the old town but only a 5 minute walk into it.
- Great pool area, perfect for relaxing after a day out.
- Breakfast was good quality with both western and local options
review.comment_negative: WiFi patchy in areas but seems to be an issue across Hoi An.

review.rating: We had a great stay at this hotel. We couldn’t recommend it more. Rooms, staff, location and facilities were all perfect
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: Great location, staff are so friendly and go above and beyond to help the guests. Rooms are lovely and clean and the pool and gym are great. We will definitely be back!

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: Bardzo dobra lokalizacja, blisko startego centrum miasta. Na śniadanie wybór bardzo duży. Personel organizuje transport i wszystkie wycieczki na życzenie klienta. Spa także dobrze zorganizowane i personel profesjonalny

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive:
- Comfortable rooms, with good AC and strong WiFi.
- Good location, walking distance to the Night Market and a 10 min ride to the An Bang beach.
- Great breakfast that varies from day to day.
- Friendly and helpful staff who speaks English.
- Value for money.
review.comment_negative: The rooster who kept waking us up in the morning.

review.rating: Great hotel at a very reasonable price. Staff go beyond expectaations.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive:
The location of the hotel is very good. It is a short walk to the Cong Nu Ngoc Hoa st that is pedestrian st. That goes through the Japaneese Covered Bridge( Under construction )
The hotel area is away from the hussle and bussle. 
Breakfast is seved as a buffet. Mostly asian food. Very good . You can also have an evening meal at the hotel ,which we did the first night and it was very good.
The pool area is very nice and relaxing. Drinks can be served from the bar and put on tab.
The staff are very friendly and helpfull. They will book you tickets and taxis. We also had them arrange a car to pick us up from the Da Nang airport and return to a hotel in Da Nang.
review.comment_negative:
Not very impressed with the city view and the rooster cock a doodling in the morning.
We complained to the reception desk that we did not like having to do the registration on line ( phone )

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Thời Thượng Có Ban Công & Tầm Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive: El buen servicio al cliente que tienen, nos ayudaron en todo! El desayuno lo varían cada día y ofrecen bicis gratis.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive:
WOW! 🤩 we absolutely loved our stay at La Charm, and we’re even considering extending our stay because of how wonderful it is.

Starting with the team - Ms Thao especially, as well as Mr Thien and Mr Dang, for their outstanding service and support.

The facilities are also top notch - the hotel is modern, while keeping Hoi Ans charm, the pool and spa are also great. Breakfast was plentiful with a very good selection, and good mix of different cuisines.

The staff were also very helpful in helping us book tours and plan our stay.

just WOW!
review.comment_negative: Minor detail to take note of is that it is a short walk away from Hoi An centre. For us this was a plus, but other travelers may wish to be more centrally located.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
Phòng Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Thời Thượng Có Ban Công & Tầm Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive: 鄰近會安夜市，逛街非常便利。且設施完善，SPA,便宜又舒適，值得一試。

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Thời Thượng Có Ban Công & Tầm Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive: The staff were super friendly always willing to help and lots of information. They were even able to organise a specially catered tour. The location is in walking distance from almost everything and the hotel has free bikes. The room was the cleanest in Vietnam we had. The hotel staff helped make our stay in Hoi An very enjoyable.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive: The location, the staff and the breakfast are good.
review.comment_negative: The WiFi is a little bit slow.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ

review.rating: 地理位置、服務、整潔及舒適度都很滿意，很棒的住宿體驗
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: 服務人員都很親切

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Có Cửa Sổ
review.comment_positive:
Amazing food.. staff.. view and feel 
Very good lay of breakfast and very good options for vegan and vegetarian food.. family loved it.. bycycles were free of cost available.. very close to old town.. very beautiful hotel and people staff

review.rating: Fabulous experience lit up with all time smiling staffs
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: The staffs are just amazing and very supportive
review.comment_negative: None or may be more options for indians

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ

review.rating: Good hotel for a couple of nights in Hoi An
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Khu Phố Cổ
review.comment_positive: Hotel is located just outside the old town area of Hoi An, which is perfect. Breakfast had alot to offer and was very nice. Also, bikes from the hotel are free to use, which is awesome.
review.comment_negative: Just moments after arriving in the hotel, the front-office lady was trying to sell tours/activity package deals quite agressive like she was on a sales-quota. Don’t get me wrong, she was a sweetheart, but we had the feeling of being sold to multiple times during our stay here, which created a very weird atmosphere now and then. Same trips/activities can be booked outside the hotel, saving you quite some money.

review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình
review.comment_positive: Khách sạn khá ổn, view từ phòng cũng bình thường. Cả nhóm thấy chấp nhận được.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 3 Người/Gia Đình
review.comment_positive:
Breakfast was good with varieties 
Location was excellent 
Staffs were very friendly
